Stem cell.title: Flexible nanoelectronics reveal arrhythmogenesis in transplanted human cardiomyocytes
Stem cell.abstract: The transplantation of human induced pluripotent stem cell-derived cardiomyocytes (hiPSC-CMs) offers a potential treatment for heart failure, but arrhythmogenic automaticity arising from transplanted cells can arise. In this study, we investigated the effects of RADA16, a clinically approved self-assembling peptide that forms nanofibers after injection, on the vascularization, myofibril structure, and electrophysiological adaptation of hiPSC-CMs transplanted into rat hearts. RADA16 accelerated the transition of hiPSC-CMs toward adult-like gene expression profiles, enhanced sarcomere organization, and improved vascularization in the transplanted site. Flexible mesh nanoelectronics revealed fibrillation of transplanted hiPSC-CMs within the beating recipient heart, and RADA16 dramatically reduced the automaticity of hiPSC-CMs. Our findings demonstrate the potential of self-assembling nanofibers to advance cardiac cell therapy and how flexible mesh nanoelectronics technology could improve safety.

Stem cell.title_cn: 柔性纳米电子学揭示移植人类心肌细胞中的心律失常发生机制
Stem cell.abstract_cn: 人类诱导多能干细胞来源的心肌细胞（hiPSC-CMs）移植为心力衰竭提供了一种潜在的治疗方法，但移植细胞可能产生致心律失常的自律性。本研究中，我们探讨了RADA16（一种临床批准的、注射后可形成纳米纤维的自组装肽）对移植到大鼠心脏中的hiPSC-CMs的血管化、肌原纤维结构和电生理适应性的影响。RADA16加速了hiPSC-CMs向成人样基因表达谱的转变，增强了肌节组织，并改善了移植部位的血管化。柔性网状纳米电子学揭示了跳动受体心脏中移植hiPSC-CMs的颤动现象，而RADA16显著降低了hiPSC-CMs的自律性。我们的研究结果表明，自组装纳米纤维在推动心脏细胞治疗方面的潜力，以及柔性网状纳米电子学技术如何提高治疗安全性。

Bioengineering.title: Engineered geminivirus replicons enable rapid in planta directed evolution
Bioengineering.abstract: Directed evolution can rapidly generate genetic variants with new and enhanced properties, yet efficient platforms for performing such evolution directly in plant cells have been lacking. We developed Geminivirus Replicon-Assisted in Planta Directed Evolution (GRAPE), a system that links gene function to geminivirus rolling circle replication (RCR) to enable high-throughput selection for desired activities. GRAPE supports the screening of up to 105 variants on a single Nicotiana benthamiana leaf within four days. Using GRAPE, we evolved the immune receptor NRC3 to resist inhibition by the nematode effector SPRYSEC15 and broadened the recognition spectrum of the rice immune receptor Pikm-1 to recognize all six alleles of the fungal effector AVR-Pik. GRAPE provides a rapid, scalable, and generalizable platform for directed evolution of diverse genes in plant cellular context.

Bioengineering.title_cn: 工程化的双生病毒复制子实现植物体内快速定向进化
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: 定向进化能够快速产生具有新颖和增强特性的遗传变异体，然而，在植物细胞中直接进行此类进化的有效平台一直缺乏。我们开发了一种名为“双生病毒复制子辅助植物体内定向进化”（Geminivirus Replicon-Assisted in Planta Directed Evolution, GRAPE）的系统。该系统将基因功能与双生病毒滚环复制（rolling circle replication, RCR）联系起来，从而实现对所需活性进行高通量筛选。GRAPE系统能够在四天内，在单片本氏烟（Nicotiana benthamiana）叶片上筛选多达10^5个变异体。利用GRAPE，我们成功进化了免疫受体NRC3，使其能够抵抗线虫效应子SPRYSEC15的抑制；并拓宽了水稻免疫受体Pikm-1的识别谱，使其能够识别真菌效应子AVR-Pik的所有六个等位基因。GRAPE为在植物细胞环境中对多种基因进行定向进化提供了一个快速、可扩展且普适的平台。

Bioengineering.title: Multi-omics analysis of a pig-to-human decedent kidney xenotransplant
Bioengineering.summary: Nature, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09846-7Multi-omics analysis of a pig-to-human decedent kidney xenotransplant
Bioengineering.abstract: Organ shortage remains a major challenge in transplantation, and gene-edited pig organs offer a promising solution1–3. Despite gene-editing, the immune reactions following xenotransplantation can still cause transplant failure4. To understand the immunological response of a pig-to-human kidney xenotransplantation, we conducted large-scale multi-omics profiling of the xenograft and the host’s blood over a 61-day procedure in a brain-dead human (decedent) recipient. Blood plasmablasts, natural killer (NK) cells, and dendritic cells increased between postoperative day (POD)10 and 28, concordant with expansion of IgG/IgA B-cell clonotypes, and subsequent biopsy-confirmed antibody-mediated rejection (AbMR) at POD33. Human T-cell frequencies increased from POD21 and peaked between POD33-49 in the blood and xenograft, coinciding with T-cell receptor diversification, expansion of a restricted TRBV2/J1 clonotype and histological evidence of a combined AbMR and cell-mediated rejection at POD49. At POD33, the most abundant human immune population in the graft was CXCL9+ macrophages, aligning with IFN-γ-driven inflammation and a Type I immune response. In addition, we see evidence of interactions between activated pig-resident macrophages and infiltrating human immune cells. Xenograft tissue showed pro-fibrotic tubular and interstitial injury, marked by S100A65, SPP16 (Osteopontin), and COLEC117, at POD21–POD33. Proteomics profiling revealed human and pig complement activation, with decreased human component after AbMR therapy with complement inhibition. Collectively, these data delineate the molecular orchestration of human immune responses to a porcine kidney, revealing potential immunomodulatory targets for improving xenograft survival.

Bioengineering.title_cn: 猪-人脑死亡受者肾脏异种移植的多组学分析
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: 器官短缺仍然是移植领域的一大挑战，而基因编辑猪器官提供了一个有前景的解决方案1–3。尽管进行了基因编辑，异种移植后的免疫反应仍可能导致移植失败4。为了理解猪-人肾脏异种移植的免疫反应，我们对一名脑死亡人类受者进行了为期61天的大规模异种移植物和宿主血液多组学分析。术后第10天至第28天，血液中的浆母细胞、自然杀伤（NK）细胞和树突状细胞数量增加，这与IgG/IgA B细胞克隆型的扩增一致，并在术后第33天通过活检证实了抗体介导的排斥反应（AbMR）。人类T细胞频率从术后第21天开始增加，并在术后第33-49天在血液和异种移植物中达到峰值，同时伴随着T细胞受体多样化、受限TRBV2/J1克隆型的扩增以及术后第49天组织学上证实了AbMR和细胞介导排斥反应的结合。在术后第33天，移植物中最丰富的人类免疫细胞群是CXCL9+巨噬细胞，这与IFN-γ驱动的炎症和I型免疫反应相符。此外，我们还观察到活化的猪驻留巨噬细胞与浸润的人类免疫细胞之间存在相互作用的证据。异种移植物组织在术后第21-33天表现出促纤维化肾小管和间质损伤，其特征是S100A65、SPP16（骨桥蛋白）和COLEC117的表达。蛋白质组学分析揭示了人源和猪源补体的激活，在进行补体抑制的AbMR治疗后，人源补体成分有所下降。综合来看，这些数据描绘了人类对猪肾脏免疫反应的分子调控机制，揭示了改善异种移植物存活的潜在免疫调节靶点。

Bioengineering.title: Physiology and immunology of pig-to-human decedent kidney xenotransplant
Bioengineering.summary: Nature, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09847-6Physiology and immunology of pig-to-human decedent kidney xenotransplant
Bioengineering.abstract: Xenotransplantation of genetically-modified pig kidneys offers a solution to the scarcity of organs for end-stage renal disease patients.1 We performed a 61-day alpha-Gal knock-out pig kidney and thymic autograft transplant into a nephrectomized brain-dead human using clinically approved immunosuppression, without CD40 blockade or additional genetic modification. Hemodynamic and electrolyte stability and dialysis independence were achieved. Post-operative day (POD) 10 biopsies revealed glomerular IgM and IgA deposition, activation of early complement components and mesangiolysis with stable renal function without proteinuria, a phenotype not seen in allotransplantation. On POD 33, an abrupt increase in serum creatinine was associated with antibody-mediated rejection and increased donor-specific IgG. Plasma exchange, C3/C3b inhibition and rabbit anti-thymocyte globulin (rATG), completely reversed xenograft rejection. Pre-existing donor-reactive T cell clones expanded progressively in the circulation post-transplant, acquired an effector transcriptional profile and were detected in the POD 33 rejecting xenograft prior to rATG treatment. This study provides the first long-term physiologic, immunologic, and infectious disease monitoring of a pig-to-human kidney xenotransplant and indicates that pre-existing xenoreactive T cells and induced antibodies to unknown epitope(s) present a major challenge, despite significant immunosuppression. It also demonstrates that a minimally gene-edited pig kidney can support long-term life-sustaining physiologic functions in a human.

Bioengineering.title_cn: 猪-人逝者肾脏异种移植的生理学与免疫学研究
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: 基因编辑猪肾的异种移植为终末期肾病患者的器官短缺问题提供了解决方案。我们进行了一项为期61天的α-Gal基因敲除猪肾和胸腺自体移植，将其植入一名已切除肾脏的脑死亡人体内，并使用了临床批准的免疫抑制方案，未进行CD40阻断或额外的基因修饰。研究实现了血流动力学和电解质的稳定，并摆脱了透析依赖。术后第10天的活检显示肾小球IgM和IgA沉积、早期补体成分激活以及系膜溶解，但肾功能稳定且无蛋白尿，这是一种在同种异体移植中未见的表型。术后第33天，血清肌酐突然升高，这与抗体介导的排斥反应和供体特异性IgG的增加有关。血浆置换、C3/C3b抑制以及兔抗胸腺细胞球蛋白（rATG）完全逆转了异种移植物的排斥反应。移植后，循环中预先存在的供体反应性T细胞克隆逐渐扩增，获得了效应转录谱，并在rATG治疗前于术后第33天排斥的异种移植物中被检测到。本研究首次对猪-人肾脏异种移植进行了长期的生理、免疫和感染性疾病监测，结果表明，尽管进行了显著的免疫抑制，预先存在的异种反应性T细胞和针对未知表位产生的抗体仍然构成了主要挑战。本研究还表明，一个经过微量基因编辑的猪肾可以在人体内支持长期的生命维持生理功能。

Bioengineering.title: Isotropic, aberration-corrected light sheet microscopy for rapid high-resolution imaging of cleared tissue
Bioengineering.summary: Nature Biotechnology, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41587-025-02882-8A light-sheet microscope built from off-the-shelf components enables high-resolution clear tissue imaging.
Bioengineering.abstract: Light-sheet microscopy is ideal for imaging large and cleared tissues, but achieving a high isotropic resolution for a centimeter-sized sample is limited by slow and often aberrated, axially scanned light sheets. Here, we introduce a compact, high-speed light-sheet fluorescence microscope achieving 850 nm isotropic resolution across cleared samples up to 1 cm³ and refractive indices ranging from 1.33 to 1.56. Using off-the-shelf optics, we combine an air objective and a meniscus lens with an axially swept light sheet to achieve diffraction-limited resolution and aberration correction. The effective field of view is increased by twofold by correcting the field curvature of the light sheet using a concave mirror in the remote focusing unit. Adapting the light sheet’s motion with a closed-loop feedback enhances the imaging speed by tenfold, reaching 100 frames per second while maintaining resolution and field of view. We benchmark the system performance across scales, from subcellular structure up to centimeter scale, using various clearing methods. A light-sheet microscope built from off-the-shelf components enables high-resolution clear tissue imaging.

Bioengineering.title_cn: 用于透明化组织快速高分辨率成像的各向同性像差校正光片显微镜
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: 光片显微镜是成像大型透明化组织的理想选择，但对于厘米级样本实现高各向同性分辨率，受限于缓慢且常伴有像差的轴向扫描光片。在此，我们介绍了一种紧凑型高速光片荧光显微镜，它能在高达1立方厘米、折射率范围为1.33至1.56的透明化样本中实现850纳米的各向同性分辨率。通过使用市售光学元件，我们将空气物镜和弯月透镜与轴向扫描光片相结合，实现了衍射极限分辨率和像差校正。通过在远程聚焦单元中使用凹面镜校正光片的场曲，有效视场增加了两倍。通过闭环反馈调整光片的运动，成像速度提高了十倍，达到每秒100帧，同时保持了分辨率和视场。我们使用多种透明化方法，对该系统从亚细胞结构到厘米尺度的性能进行了基准测试。这种由市售组件构建的光片显微镜能够实现高分辨率的透明组织成像。

Bioengineering.title: Boosting the brightness of aggregation-caused quenching chromophore-based covalent organic frameworks via energy level matching strategy
Bioengineering.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64952-4As a result of aggregation-caused quenching (ACQ), many fluorophores show only weak emission when incorporated into covalent organic frameworks. Here, the authors report the development of emissive COFs from ACQ chromophores by an energy level matching strategy.
Bioengineering.abstract: Most chromophores exhibit an aggregation-caused quenching (ACQ) effect, resulting in minimal or weak emission when incorporated into covalent organic frameworks (COFs). Consequently, the development of luminescent COFs, particularly those utilizing ACQ chromophores, presents both a compelling and formidable challenge. Herein, we report the construction of highly emissive ACQ chromophore-based COFs by an energy level matching strategy. This approach effectively modulates the electronic structures within the COFs, thereby suppressing intralayer charge transfer to ACQ chromophores, such as the imine linkage and dibenzo[g,p]chrysene unit, while simultaneously inhibiting interlayer charge transfer and non-radiative decay pathways. As a result, the undesired ACQ effect is mitigated, enabling the realization of highly emissive COFs. Notably, COF-BT-PhDBC demonstrates high brightness with a solid-state photoluminescence quantum yield of 14.7%, standing among the best ACQ chromophore-based COFs. Furthermore, COF-BT-PhDBC has been successfully utilized for in vivo three-photon fluorescence imaging of murine brain vasculature, achieving an impressive imaging depth of approximately 800 µm. As a result of aggregation-caused quenching (ACQ), many fluorophores show only weak emission when incorporated into covalent organic frameworks. Here, the authors report the development of emissive COFs from ACQ chromophores by an energy level matching strategy.

Bioengineering.title_cn: 通过能级匹配策略增强聚集诱导猝灭发色团基共价有机框架的发光亮度
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: 大多数发色团表现出聚集诱导猝灭（ACQ）效应，导致其在掺入共价有机框架（COFs）后发光微弱或不发光。因此，开发发光COFs，特别是利用ACQ发色团的COFs，既是一个引人注目又极具挑战性的课题。在此，我们报道了通过能级匹配策略构建高发光效率的ACQ发色团基COFs。该方法有效调控了COFs内部的电子结构，从而抑制了层内电荷向ACQ发色团（如亚胺键和二苯并[g,p]屈单元）的转移，同时抑制了层间电荷转移和非辐射衰变途径。结果，不希望的ACQ效应得到缓解，从而实现了高发光效率的COFs。值得注意的是，COF-BT-PhDBC表现出高亮度，其固态光致发光量子产率达到14.7%，位列最佳ACQ发色团基COFs之列。此外，COF-BT-PhDBC已成功应用于小鼠脑血管的体内三光子荧光成像，实现了约800微米的惊人成像深度。由于聚集诱导猝灭（ACQ）效应，许多荧光团在掺入共价有机框架时仅表现出微弱的发光。本文中，作者报道了通过能级匹配策略从ACQ发色团开发出具有发光性能的COFs。

Bioengineering.title: MISO: microfluidic protein isolation enables single-particle cryo-EM structure determination from a single cell colony
Bioengineering.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02894-xThe micro isolation (MISO) method combines microfluidics-based protein purification with cryo-EM grid preparation, enabling cryo-EM structure determination of soluble and membrane proteins starting from less than 1 µg of a target protein.
Bioengineering.abstract: Single-particle cryogenic electron microscopy (cryo-EM) enables reconstruction of atomic-resolution 3D maps of proteins by visualizing thousands to millions of purified protein particles embedded in vitreous ice. This corresponds to picograms of purified protein, which can potentially be isolated from a few thousand cells. Hence, cryo-EM holds the potential of a very sensitive analytical method for delivering high-resolution protein structure as a readout. In practice, millions of times more starting biological material is required to prepare cryo-EM grids. Here we show that using a micro isolation (MISO) method, which combines microfluidics-based protein purification with cryo-EM grid preparation, cryo-EM structures of soluble bacterial and eukaryotic membrane proteins can be solved starting from less than 1 µg of a target protein and progressing from cells to cryo-EM grids within a few hours. This scales down the amount of starting biological material hundreds to thousands of times, opening possibilities for the structural characterization of hitherto inaccessible proteins. The micro isolation (MISO) method combines microfluidics-based protein purification with cryo-EM grid preparation, enabling cryo-EM structure determination of soluble and membrane proteins starting from less than 1 µg of a target protein.

Bioengineering.title_cn: MISO：微流控蛋白分离助力单细胞集落的单颗粒冷冻电镜结构测定
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: 单颗粒冷冻电子显微镜（cryo-EM）通过观察包埋在玻璃态冰中的数千至数百万个纯化蛋白质颗粒，能够重建蛋白质的原子分辨率三维结构图。这相当于皮克级的纯化蛋白质，理论上可以从数千个细胞中分离得到。因此，cryo-EM 有潜力成为一种非常灵敏的分析方法，以高分辨率蛋白质结构作为输出。然而，在实际操作中，制备 cryo-EM 样品网格需要多达数百万倍的起始生物材料。本文展示了一种微分离（MISO）方法，该方法结合了基于微流控的蛋白质纯化与 cryo-EM 样品网格制备，能够从少于 1 微克的靶蛋白开始，并在数小时内从细胞到 cryo-EM 样品网格，解析可溶性细菌和真核膜蛋白的 cryo-EM 结构。这使得起始生物材料的用量减少了数百至数千倍，为迄今难以获得的蛋白质的结构表征开辟了可能性。微分离（MISO）方法结合了基于微流控的蛋白质纯化与 cryo-EM 样品网格制备，使得从少于 1 微克的靶蛋白开始即可进行可溶性蛋白和膜蛋白的 cryo-EM 结构测定。

Bioengineering.title: Stimulus-modulated approach to steady state (SASS): a flexible paradigm for event-related fMRI
Bioengineering.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02902-0Stimulus-modulated approach to steady state (SASS) is an acquisition scheme for event-related fMRI that generates data with high temporal signal-to-noise ratios interspaced with acquisition-free periods for stimulus presentation or response recording. It is demonstrated in auditory and visual stimulation paradigms in marmosets at 9.4 T and in human participants at 3 T.
Bioengineering.abstract: Functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI) studies discard the initial volumes acquired during the approach of the magnetization to its steady-state value. Here we leverage the higher temporal signal-to-noise ratio of these initial volumes to increase the sensitivity of event-related fMRI experiments. We introduce acquisition-free periods (AFPs) that permit the full recovery of the magnetization, followed by an acquisition block of fMRI volumes. An appropriately placed stimulus in the AFP produces a blood oxygenation level-dependent response that peaks during the initial high temporal signal-to-noise ratio phase of the acquisition block. Using humans and monkeys (Callithrix jacchus) at different field strengths, we demonstrate up to a ~50% reduction in the number of trials needed to achieve a given statistical threshold relative to conventional fMRI. The silent AFP can be exploited for the presentation of auditory stimuli or uncontaminated electrophysiological recording and its variable duration allows aperiodic stimulus or response-locked signal averaging as well as gating to physiology or motion. Stimulus-modulated approach to steady state (SASS) is an acquisition scheme for event-related fMRI that generates data with high temporal signal-to-noise ratios interspaced with acquisition-free periods for stimulus presentation or response recording. It is demonstrated in auditory and visual stimulation paradigms in marmosets at 9.4 T and in human participants at 3 T.

Bioengineering.title_cn: 刺激调制稳态逼近法 (SASS)：一种用于事件相关功能磁共振成像的灵活范式
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: 功能磁共振成像 (fMRI) 研究通常会丢弃磁化强度达到稳态过程中采集的初始体数据。本研究利用这些初始体数据较高的时间信噪比，以提高事件相关fMRI实验的灵敏度。我们引入了无采集期 (AFPs)，该时期允许磁化强度完全恢复，随后是一个fMRI体数据的采集块。在无采集期内适当放置的刺激会产生血氧水平依赖性 (BOLD) 反应，该反应在采集块初始高时间信噪比阶段达到峰值。通过在不同场强下对人类和狨猴 (Callithrix jacchus) 进行研究，我们证明与传统fMRI相比，达到给定统计阈值所需的试验次数可减少约50%。静默的无采集期可用于呈现听觉刺激或进行无干扰的电生理记录，其可变持续时间允许非周期性刺激或响应锁定信号平均，以及生理或运动门控。刺激调制稳态逼近法 (SASS) 是一种事件相关fMRI采集方案，它生成具有高时间信噪比的数据，并穿插无采集期用于刺激呈现或响应记录。该方法已在9.4 T场强下的狨猴听觉和视觉刺激范式以及3 T场强下的人类受试者中得到验证。

Bioengineering.title: Confocal Airy beam oblique light-sheet tomography for brain-wide cell type distribution and morphology
Bioengineering.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02888-9Confocal Airy beam integrated with single-photon oblique light-sheet tomography (CAB-OLST) is a high-throughput imaging approach for brain-wide mapping of neurons, as demonstrated in cleared mouse brains.
Bioengineering.abstract: Advanced brain-wide mapping is critical for addressing complex questions in neuroscience. However, current imaging methods are limited by throughput, resolution and signal-to-noise ratio, constraining their broader applicability. Here, we present confocal Airy beam integrated with single-photon oblique light-sheet tomography (CAB-OLST): a system that integrates single-photon excitation with a scanned Airy beam light sheet, virtual slit detection and automated mechanical sectioning. CAB-OLST enables high-throughput, high-resolution and high-signal-to-noise ratio volumetric imaging, achieving an optical resolution of 0.77 μm × 0.49 μm × 2.61 μm. This allows for mouse brain-wide cell type distribution mapping at a voxel size of 0.37 μm × 0.37 μm × 1.77 μm in 10 h and single-neuron projectome imaging with a voxel size of 0.26 μm × 0.26 μm × 1.06 μm over 58 h. Compared to existing light-sheet and point-scanning systems, CAB-OLST provides a scalable and robust platform for comprehensive neuronal morphology reconstruction and high-precision cell atlas generation. Confocal Airy beam integrated with single-photon oblique light-sheet tomography (CAB-OLST) is a high-throughput imaging approach for brain-wide mapping of neurons, as demonstrated in cleared mouse brains.

Bioengineering.title_cn: 共聚焦艾里光束斜光片断层成像技术用于全脑细胞类型分布和形态学研究
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: 先进的全脑图谱绘制对于解决神经科学中的复杂问题至关重要。然而，当前的成像方法在通量、分辨率和信噪比方面存在局限性，限制了其更广泛的应用。在此，我们提出了一种结合了共聚焦艾里光束和单光子斜光片断层成像技术（CAB-OLST）的系统：该系统集成了单光子激发、扫描艾里光束光片、虚拟狭缝检测和自动化机械切片。CAB-OLST 实现了高通量、高分辨率和高信噪比的体积成像，光学分辨率达到 0.77 μm × 0.49 μm × 2.61 μm。这使得在10小时内以0.37 μm × 0.37 μm × 1.77 μm的体素尺寸绘制小鼠全脑细胞类型分布图成为可能，并在58小时内以0.26 μm × 0.26 μm × 1.06 μm的体素尺寸进行单神经元投射组成像。与现有的光片和点扫描系统相比，CAB-OLST 为全面的神经元形态重建和高精度细胞图谱生成提供了一个可扩展且稳健的平台。共聚焦艾里光束结合单光子斜光片断层成像技术（CAB-OLST）是一种高通量成像方法，用于神经元的全脑图谱绘制，已在透明化小鼠大脑中得到验证。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Flexible nanoelectronics reveal arrhythmogenesis in transplanted human cardiomyocytes
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: The transplantation of human induced pluripotent stem cell-derived cardiomyocytes (hiPSC-CMs) offers a potential treatment for heart failure, but arrhythmogenic automaticity arising from transplanted cells can arise. In this study, we investigated the effects of RADA16, a clinically approved self-assembling peptide that forms nanofibers after injection, on the vascularization, myofibril structure, and electrophysiological adaptation of hiPSC-CMs transplanted into rat hearts. RADA16 accelerated the transition of hiPSC-CMs toward adult-like gene expression profiles, enhanced sarcomere organization, and improved vascularization in the transplanted site. Flexible mesh nanoelectronics revealed fibrillation of transplanted hiPSC-CMs within the beating recipient heart, and RADA16 dramatically reduced the automaticity of hiPSC-CMs. Our findings demonstrate the potential of self-assembling nanofibers to advance cardiac cell therapy and how flexible mesh nanoelectronics technology could improve safety.

Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 柔性纳米电子学揭示移植人类心肌细胞中的心律失常发生机制
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 人类诱导多能干细胞来源的心肌细胞（hiPSC-CMs）移植为心力衰竭提供了一种潜在的治疗方法，但移植细胞可能产生致心律失常的自律性。本研究中，我们探讨了RADA16（一种临床批准的、注射后可形成纳米纤维的自组装肽）对移植到大鼠心脏中的hiPSC-CMs的血管化、肌原纤维结构和电生理适应性的影响。RADA16加速了hiPSC-CMs向成人样基因表达谱的转变，增强了肌节组织，并改善了移植部位的血管化。柔性网状纳米电子学揭示了跳动受体心脏中移植hiPSC-CMs的颤动现象，而RADA16显著降低了hiPSC-CMs的自律性。我们的研究结果表明，自组装纳米纤维在推动心脏细胞治疗方面的潜力，以及柔性网状纳米电子学技术如何提高治疗安全性。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Multi-omics analysis of a pig-to-human decedent kidney xenotransplant
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09846-7Multi-omics analysis of a pig-to-human decedent kidney xenotransplant
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Organ shortage remains a major challenge in transplantation, and gene-edited pig organs offer a promising solution1–3. Despite gene-editing, the immune reactions following xenotransplantation can still cause transplant failure4. To understand the immunological response of a pig-to-human kidney xenotransplantation, we conducted large-scale multi-omics profiling of the xenograft and the host’s blood over a 61-day procedure in a brain-dead human (decedent) recipient. Blood plasmablasts, natural killer (NK) cells, and dendritic cells increased between postoperative day (POD)10 and 28, concordant with expansion of IgG/IgA B-cell clonotypes, and subsequent biopsy-confirmed antibody-mediated rejection (AbMR) at POD33. Human T-cell frequencies increased from POD21 and peaked between POD33-49 in the blood and xenograft, coinciding with T-cell receptor diversification, expansion of a restricted TRBV2/J1 clonotype and histological evidence of a combined AbMR and cell-mediated rejection at POD49. At POD33, the most abundant human immune population in the graft was CXCL9+ macrophages, aligning with IFN-γ-driven inflammation and a Type I immune response. In addition, we see evidence of interactions between activated pig-resident macrophages and infiltrating human immune cells. Xenograft tissue showed pro-fibrotic tubular and interstitial injury, marked by S100A65, SPP16 (Osteopontin), and COLEC117, at POD21–POD33. Proteomics profiling revealed human and pig complement activation, with decreased human component after AbMR therapy with complement inhibition. Collectively, these data delineate the molecular orchestration of human immune responses to a porcine kidney, revealing potential immunomodulatory targets for improving xenograft survival.
Clinical & Medicine.authors_short: Schmauch, Eloi et al., Keating, Brendan J.
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 猪-人脑死亡受者肾脏异种移植的多组学分析
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 器官短缺仍然是移植领域的一大挑战，而基因编辑猪器官提供了一个有前景的解决方案1–3。尽管进行了基因编辑，异种移植后的免疫反应仍可能导致移植失败4。为了理解猪-人肾脏异种移植的免疫反应，我们对一名脑死亡人类受者进行了为期61天的大规模异种移植物和宿主血液多组学分析。术后第10天至第28天，血液中的浆母细胞、自然杀伤（NK）细胞和树突状细胞数量增加，这与IgG/IgA B细胞克隆型的扩增一致，并在术后第33天通过活检证实了抗体介导的排斥反应（AbMR）。人类T细胞频率从术后第21天开始增加，并在术后第33-49天在血液和异种移植物中达到峰值，同时伴随着T细胞受体多样化、受限TRBV2/J1克隆型的扩增以及术后第49天组织学上证实了AbMR和细胞介导排斥反应的结合。在术后第33天，移植物中最丰富的人类免疫细胞群是CXCL9+巨噬细胞，这与IFN-γ驱动的炎症和I型免疫反应相符。此外，我们还观察到活化的猪驻留巨噬细胞与浸润的人类免疫细胞之间存在相互作用的证据。异种移植物组织在术后第21-33天表现出促纤维化肾小管和间质损伤，其特征是S100A65、SPP16（骨桥蛋白）和COLEC117的表达。蛋白质组学分析揭示了人源和猪源补体的激活，在进行补体抑制的AbMR治疗后，人源补体成分有所下降。综合来看，这些数据描绘了人类对猪肾脏免疫反应的分子调控机制，揭示了改善异种移植物存活的潜在免疫调节靶点。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Physiology and immunology of pig-to-human decedent kidney xenotransplant
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09847-6Physiology and immunology of pig-to-human decedent kidney xenotransplant
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Xenotransplantation of genetically-modified pig kidneys offers a solution to the scarcity of organs for end-stage renal disease patients.1 We performed a 61-day alpha-Gal knock-out pig kidney and thymic autograft transplant into a nephrectomized brain-dead human using clinically approved immunosuppression, without CD40 blockade or additional genetic modification. Hemodynamic and electrolyte stability and dialysis independence were achieved. Post-operative day (POD) 10 biopsies revealed glomerular IgM and IgA deposition, activation of early complement components and mesangiolysis with stable renal function without proteinuria, a phenotype not seen in allotransplantation. On POD 33, an abrupt increase in serum creatinine was associated with antibody-mediated rejection and increased donor-specific IgG. Plasma exchange, C3/C3b inhibition and rabbit anti-thymocyte globulin (rATG), completely reversed xenograft rejection. Pre-existing donor-reactive T cell clones expanded progressively in the circulation post-transplant, acquired an effector transcriptional profile and were detected in the POD 33 rejecting xenograft prior to rATG treatment. This study provides the first long-term physiologic, immunologic, and infectious disease monitoring of a pig-to-human kidney xenotransplant and indicates that pre-existing xenoreactive T cells and induced antibodies to unknown epitope(s) present a major challenge, despite significant immunosuppression. It also demonstrates that a minimally gene-edited pig kidney can support long-term life-sustaining physiologic functions in a human.
Clinical & Medicine.authors_short: Montgomery, Robert A. et al., Sykes, Megan
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 猪-人逝者肾脏异种移植的生理学与免疫学研究
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 基因编辑猪肾的异种移植为终末期肾病患者的器官短缺问题提供了解决方案。我们进行了一项为期61天的α-Gal基因敲除猪肾和胸腺自体移植，将其植入一名已切除肾脏的脑死亡人体内，并使用了临床批准的免疫抑制方案，未进行CD40阻断或额外的基因修饰。研究实现了血流动力学和电解质的稳定，并摆脱了透析依赖。术后第10天的活检显示肾小球IgM和IgA沉积、早期补体成分激活以及系膜溶解，但肾功能稳定且无蛋白尿，这是一种在同种异体移植中未见的表型。术后第33天，血清肌酐突然升高，这与抗体介导的排斥反应和供体特异性IgG的增加有关。血浆置换、C3/C3b抑制以及兔抗胸腺细胞球蛋白（rATG）完全逆转了异种移植物的排斥反应。移植后，循环中预先存在的供体反应性T细胞克隆逐渐扩增，获得了效应转录谱，并在rATG治疗前于术后第33天排斥的异种移植物中被检测到。本研究首次对猪-人肾脏异种移植进行了长期的生理、免疫和感染性疾病监测，结果表明，尽管进行了显著的免疫抑制，预先存在的异种反应性T细胞和针对未知表位产生的抗体仍然构成了主要挑战。本研究还表明，一个经过微量基因编辑的猪肾可以在人体内支持长期的生命维持生理功能。

Stratification by age at onset can uncover risk effects relevant to severe outcomes and inform prevention strategies.

Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 发病年龄视角下的抑郁症遗传学
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 一项利用来自五个北欧国家的生物样本库和登记数据进行的研究揭示，早发型和晚发型重度抑郁症具有独特的遗传关联，并且在遗传结构以及与其他性状的关系上存在差异。根据发病年龄进行分层，有助于揭示与严重结局相关的风险效应，并为制定预防策略提供依据。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Genome-wide association analyses identify distinct genetic architectures for early-onset and late-onset depression
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature Genetics, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41588-025-02396-8Genome-wide association analyses leveraging Nordic biobanks with longitudinal health registries identify differences in the genetic architectures of early-onset and late-onset major depressive disorder and in their genetic correlations with related traits.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Major depressive disorder (MDD) is a common and heterogeneous disorder of complex etiology. Studying more homogeneous groups stratified according to clinical characteristics, such as age of onset, can improve the identification of the underlying genetic causes and lead to more targeted treatment strategies. We leveraged Nordic biobanks with longitudinal health registries to investigate differences in the genetic architectures of early-onset (eoMDD; n = 46,708 cases) and late-onset (loMDD; n = 37,168 cases) MDD. We identified 12 genomic loci for eoMDD and two for loMDD. Overall, the two MDD subtypes correlated moderately (genetic correlation, rg = 0.58) and differed in their genetic correlations with related traits. These findings suggest that eoMDD and loMDD have partially distinct genetic signatures, with a specific developmental brain signature for eoMDD. Importantly, we demonstrate that polygenic risk scores (PRS) for eoMDD predict suicide attempts within the first 10 years after the initial diagnosis: the absolute risk for suicide attempt was 26% in the top PRS decile, compared to 12% and 20% in the bottom decile and the intermediate group, respectively. Taken together, our findings can inform precision psychiatry approaches for MDD. Genome-wide association analyses leveraging Nordic biobanks with longitudinal health registries identify differences in the genetic architectures of early-onset and late-onset major depressive disorder and in their genetic correlations with related traits.
Clinical & Medicine.authors_short: Shorter, John R. et al., Lu, Yi
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 全基因组关联分析揭示早发型和迟发型抑郁症的独特遗传结构
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 重度抑郁症（MDD）是一种常见且异质性高的疾病，其病因复杂。根据临床特征（如发病年龄）对更同质的群体进行研究，有助于更好地识别潜在的遗传病因，并制定更具针对性的治疗策略。我们利用北欧生物样本库及其纵向健康登记数据，调查了早发型（eoMDD；46,708例）和迟发型（loMDD；37,168例）MDD的遗传结构差异。我们为eoMDD识别出12个基因组位点，为loMDD识别出2个基因组位点。总体而言，这两种MDD亚型之间存在中度相关性（遗传相关性，rg = 0.58），并且它们与相关性状的遗传相关性也存在差异。这些发现表明，eoMDD和loMDD具有部分独特的遗传特征，其中eoMDD具有特定的发育性大脑特征。重要的是，我们证明了eoMDD的多基因风险评分（PRS）可以预测初次诊断后10年内的自杀企图：在PRS最高十分位数中，自杀企图的绝对风险为26%，而最低十分位数和中间组分别为12%和20%。综上所述，我们的研究结果可为MDD的精准精神病学方法提供信息。利用北欧生物样本库和纵向健康登记数据的全基因组关联分析，揭示了早发型和迟发型重度抑郁症在遗传结构及其与相关性状的遗传相关性方面的差异。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Heat shock protein DNAJA2 controls insulin signaling and glucose homeostasis by preventing spontaneous insulin receptor endocytosis
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64948-0Insulin signaling pathway is critical for glucose homeostasis maintenance. Here, the authors identify a role for DNAJA2 in regulating insulin signaling and glucose metabolism, loss of which causes insulin resistance and type 2 diabetes phenotypes.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Dysregulation of heat shock protein DNAJA2 induces genomic instability and was consequently hypothesized to promote tumorigenesis. However, DNAJA2 knockout mice do not develop cancer but exhibit neonatal lethality and the underlying mechanism remains unknown. Here, we demonstrate that DNAJA2 maintains homeostatic glucose metabolism by regulating insulin signaling. Mechanistically, DNAJA2 binds to the insulin receptor (IR) and prevents adaptor protein 2 (AP2)-mediated spontaneous IR endocytosis by inhibiting the IR-AP2 interaction. Thus, DNAJA2 defects lead to reduced IR localization on the plasma membrane and suppression of the insulin-stimulated signaling cascade, thereby inhibiting glycogen synthesis and storage in the liver during embryogenesis, further resulting in neonatal lethality of DNAJA2-deficient mice. Analysis of public datasets reveals a strong association between DNAJA2 and metabolic phenotypes, including type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM) and obesity, in both humans and mice. In conclusion, our study elucidates the mechanism by which DNAJA2 regulates IR endocytosis, insulin signaling and glucose metabolism, shedding light on the pathogenesis of metabolic disorders. Insulin signaling pathway is critical for glucose homeostasis maintenance. Here, the authors identify a role for DNAJA2 in regulating insulin signaling and glucose metabolism, loss of which causes insulin resistance and type 2 diabetes phenotypes.
Clinical & Medicine.authors_short: Qin, Yuanhua et al., Huang, Yaping
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 热休克蛋白DNAJA2通过阻止自发性胰岛素受体内吞来调控胰岛素信号传导和葡萄糖稳态
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 热休克蛋白DNAJA2的失调会诱导基因组不稳定性，因此曾被假设促进肿瘤发生。然而，DNAJA2敲除小鼠并未发生癌症，却表现出新生儿致死性，其潜在机制仍不清楚。本研究表明，DNAJA2通过调控胰岛素信号传导来维持葡萄糖代谢稳态。从机制上讲，DNAJA2与胰岛素受体（IR）结合，并通过抑制IR-AP2相互作用来阻止衔接蛋白2（AP2）介导的IR自发性内吞。因此，DNAJA2缺陷导致IR在质膜上的定位减少，并抑制胰岛素刺激的信号级联反应，从而在胚胎发生过程中抑制肝脏中的糖原合成和储存，进而导致DNAJA2缺陷小鼠的新生儿致死性。对公共数据集的分析揭示了DNAJA2与人类和小鼠的代谢表型（包括2型糖尿病（T2DM）和肥胖）之间存在密切关联。总之，本研究阐明了DNAJA2调控IR内吞、胰岛素信号传导和葡萄糖代谢的机制，为代谢性疾病的发病机制提供了新的见解。胰岛素信号通路对于维持葡萄糖稳态至关重要。本研究中，作者们确定了DNAJA2在调控胰岛素信号传导和葡萄糖代谢中的作用，其缺失会导致胰岛素抵抗和2型糖尿病表型。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Incorporating human mobility to enhance epidemic response and estimate real-time reproduction numbers
Clinical & Medicine.summary: by Mousumi Roy, Hannah E. Clapham, Swapnil MishraHuman mobility plays a critical role in the transmission dynamics of infectious diseases, influencing both their spread and the effectiveness of control measures. In the process of quantifying the real-time situation of an epidemic, the instantaneous reproduction numberRtappears to be one of the useful metrics widely used by public health researchers, officials, and policy makers. Since individuals can contract infections both within their region of origin and in other regions they visit, ignoring human mobility in the estimation process overlooks its impact on transmission dynamics and can lead to biased estimates ofRt, potentially misrepresenting the true epidemic situation. Our study explicitly integrates human mobility into a renewal-equation based disease transmission model to capture the mobility-driven effect on transmission. By incorporating pathogen-specific generation-time distribution, observational delay, the framework is epidemiologically informed and flexible to a wide range of diseases. We primarily validate the approach using simulated data, and demonstrate the limitations of estimatingRtwithout considering mobility. We then apply it to two real-world mobility settings using SARS-CoV-2 mortality data: the regions of England and the LTLAs of North East region of England, and uncover the mobility driven effect on transmission at different spatial resolutions. This framework uses non-identifiable and widely accessible publicly available datasets, demonstrating its practical applicability and supporting better-informed and more targeted public health measures.

Clinical & Medicine.authors_short: Mousumi Roy et al., Swapnil Mishra
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 整合人口流动性以增强疫情响应并估算实时再生数
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 人口流动性在传染病传播动力学中扮演着关键角色，影响着疾病的传播及其控制措施的有效性。在量化疫情实时状况的过程中，瞬时再生数Rt被认为是公共卫生研究人员、官员和政策制定者广泛使用的有用指标之一。由于个体既可能在其原籍地区感染，也可能在其访问的其他地区感染，因此在估算过程中忽略人口流动性会忽视其对传播动力学的影响，并可能导致Rt的估算出现偏差，从而可能歪曲真实的疫情状况。本研究将人口流动性明确整合到基于更新方程的疾病传播模型中，以捕捉流动性驱动的传播效应。通过纳入病原体特异性代际时间分布和观察延迟，该框架具有流行病学依据，并适用于多种疾病。我们主要使用模拟数据验证了该方法，并展示了在不考虑流动性情况下估算Rt的局限性。随后，我们将其应用于两个真实世界的人口流动情景，利用SARS-CoV-2死亡率数据，即英格兰的各个地区以及英格兰东北部的LTLAs（地方行政区），揭示了在不同空间分辨率下流动性驱动的传播效应。该框架利用不可识别且广泛可用的公开数据集，展示了其实际适用性，并支持制定更明智、更有针对性的公共卫生措施。

Plants.title: Engineered geminivirus replicons enable rapid in planta directed evolution
Plants.abstract: Directed evolution can rapidly generate genetic variants with new and enhanced properties, yet efficient platforms for performing such evolution directly in plant cells have been lacking. Plants.title_cn: 工程化的双生病毒复制子实现植物体内快速定向进化
Plants.abstract_cn: 定向进化能够快速产生具有新颖和增强特性的遗传变异体，然而，在植物细胞中直接进行此类进化的有效平台一直缺乏。我们开发了一种名为“双生病毒复制子辅助植物体内定向进化”（Geminivirus Replicon-Assisted in Planta Directed Evolution, GRAPE）的系统。该系统将基因功能与双生病毒滚环复制（rolling circle replication, RCR）联系起来，从而实现对所需活性进行高通量筛选。GRAPE系统能够在四天内，在单片本氏烟（Nicotiana benthamiana）叶片上筛选多达10^5个变异体。利用GRAPE，我们成功进化了免疫受体NRC3，使其能够抵抗线虫效应子SPRYSEC15的抑制；并拓宽了水稻免疫受体Pikm-1的识别谱，使其能够识别真菌效应子AVR-Pik的所有六个等位基因。GRAPE为在植物细胞环境中对多种基因进行定向进化提供了一个快速、可扩展且普适的平台。

Plants.title: Transposable elements are vectors of recurrent transgenerational epigenetic inheritance
Plants.abstract: DNA methylation loss at transposable elements (TEs) can affect neighboring genes and be epigenetically inherited in plants, yet the determinants and significance of this additional system of inheritance are unknown. Here, we demonstrate in Arabidopsis thaliana that transgenerational stability of experimentally-induced hypomethylation at TE loci is constrained by small RNAs derived from related copies. Plants.authors_short: P. Baduel et al., Vincent Colot
Plants.title_cn: 转座元件是反复发生的跨代表观遗传的载体
Plants.abstract_cn: 转座元件（TEs）的DNA甲基化缺失会影响邻近基因，并在植物中进行表观遗传，但这种额外遗传系统的决定因素和意义尚不清楚。在此，我们在拟南芥中证明，转座元件位点实验诱导的低甲基化的跨代稳定性受到相关拷贝来源的小RNA的限制。利用全球收集的700多个品系的数据，我们发现数百个此类转座元件位点（通常位于基因附近）存在相似且反复出现的低甲基化。我们测试的大多数自然表观变异体可以在没有DNA序列变化的情况下遗传，因此是真正的表观等位基因，尽管遗传因素会调节它们的复发或持久性。表观等位基因变异通常会导致基因表达变化，并可能成为选择的目标，从而揭示它们对自然界中可遗传表型变异的贡献。

Plants.title: Developmentally regulated genes drive phylogenomic splits in ovule evolution
Plants.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65399-3Making use of phylogenomic and transcriptome analysis of 20 plant species, including 14 gymnosperms, Sondervan et al. uncover candidate ovule genes and find that orthologs with differential tissue expression patterns across species most influence major evolutionary splits of seed plants.
Plants.abstract: The evolution of seeds transformed life on earth and is responsible for our most important food crops. Gymnosperms, the oldest living seed plants, are an untapped genomic reservoir for genes involved in seed evolution. To tap this resource, we assemble deep transcriptomes of 14 gymnosperms, four angiosperms, and two ferns and identified 22,429 phylogenetically informative ortholog groups. We observe that genes differentially expressed in ovules or leaves provide the majority of phylogenomic support for the evolutionary splits between 1) seed and non-seed plants; 2) gymnosperms and angiosperms; and/or 3) within gymnosperms (conifers vs. “ancient” gymnosperms). Our gymnosperm data identifies unreported candidate ovule regulated genes in Arabidopsis. Moreover, prior knowledge from Arabidopsis helps uncover 4,076 candidate ovule genes that influence these evolutionary splits. We validate the expression of candidate ovule genes in gymnosperm-specific ovule structures. Our work provides a resource for seed gene discovery, conservation, and crop improvement. Making use of phylogenomic and transcriptome analysis of 20 plant species, including 14 gymnosperms, Sondervan et al. uncover candidate ovule genes and find that orthologs with differential tissue expression patterns across species most influence major evolutionary splits of seed plants.
Plants.authors_short: Sondervan, Veronica M. et al., Coruzzi, Gloria M.
Plants.title_cn: 发育调控基因驱动胚珠进化中的系统基因组学分化
Plants.abstract_cn: 种子的进化改变了地球上的生命，并催生了我们最重要的粮食作物。裸子植物作为现存最古老的种子植物，是种子进化相关基因尚未开发的基因组宝库。为了利用这一资源，我们组装了14种裸子植物、4种被子植物和2种蕨类植物的深度转录组，并鉴定了22,429个具有系统发育信息价值的直系同源基因组。我们发现，在胚珠或叶片中差异表达的基因，为以下进化分化提供了主要的系统基因组学支持：1) 种子植物与非种子植物之间；2) 裸子植物与被子植物之间；和/或 3) 裸子植物内部（针叶树与“古老”裸子植物之间）。我们的裸子植物数据在拟南芥中识别出未曾报道的胚珠调控候选基因。此外，来自拟南芥的现有知识有助于揭示4,076个影响这些进化分化的胚珠候选基因。我们验证了候选胚珠基因在裸子植物特有胚珠结构中的表达。我们的工作为种子基因的发现、保护和作物改良提供了资源。Sondervan等人利用对包括14种裸子植物在内的20种植物物种进行的系统基因组学和转录组分析，揭示了胚珠候选基因，并发现跨物种具有差异组织表达模式的直系同源基因对种子植物的主要进化分化影响最大。

Plants.title: Pathogen-induced condensation of the guard cell RNA-binding protein SAIR1 fine-tunes translation for immunity
Plants.summary: Nature Plants, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41477-025-02154-yThe RNA-binding protein SAIR1 forms phosphorylation-regulated condensates in guard cells, which link PAMP–MPK3/6 signalling to stomatal immunity. This finding reveals how biomolecular condensates regulate spatially specific immune responses in plants.
Plants.abstract: Plant guard cells perceive pathogens and close stomata to prevent their invasion. Biomolecular condensates are membraneless organelles essential for life processes. However, guard cell biomolecular condensates mediating stomatal immunity remain unknown. Upon perception of the pathogen molecular pattern flg22, the activated kinases MPK3 and MPK6 phosphorylate SAIR1 and trigger its condensation in guard cells for stomatal immunity. SAIR1 condensates recruit translational regulators such as POLYADENYLATE-BINDING PROTEINs and eIFiso4G, and sequester defence-related mRNAs, including key components of the salicylic acid pathway. Through these interactions, SAIR1 condensates enhance the translation of defence mRNAs, ultimately promoting stomatal closure. Our findings reveal phosphorylation-regulated SAIR1 condensates as a critical hub that links flg22–MPK3/6 signalling to stomatal immunity. The RNA-binding protein SAIR1 forms phosphorylation-regulated condensates in guard cells, which link PAMP–MPK3/6 signalling to stomatal immunity. This finding reveals how biomolecular condensates regulate spatially specific immune responses in plants.

Plants.title_cn: 病原体诱导的保卫细胞RNA结合蛋白SAIR1凝聚体精细调节翻译以实现免疫
Plants.abstract_cn: 植物保卫细胞感知病原体并关闭气孔以阻止其入侵。生物分子凝聚体是生命过程必需的无膜细胞器。然而，介导气孔免疫的保卫细胞生物分子凝聚体仍不清楚。在本研究中，我们鉴定了一种保卫细胞特异性、RNA识别基序型RNA结合蛋白——气孔免疫RNA结合蛋白1 (SAIR1)，它通过相分离形成病原体响应性保卫细胞凝聚体。感知到病原体分子模式flg22后，活化的激酶MPK3和MPK6磷酸化SAIR1，并在保卫细胞中触发其凝聚，从而介导气孔免疫。SAIR1凝聚体招募翻译调节因子，如多聚腺苷酸结合蛋白(POLYADENYLATE-BINDING PROTEINs)和eIFiso4G，并隔离防御相关mRNA，包括水杨酸途径的关键组分。通过这些相互作用，SAIR1凝聚体增强防御mRNA的翻译，最终促进气孔关闭。我们的发现揭示了磷酸化调节的SAIR1凝聚体是一个关键枢纽，它将flg22–MPK3/6信号传导与气孔免疫联系起来。RNA结合蛋白SAIR1在保卫细胞中形成磷酸化调节的凝聚体，将PAMP–MPK3/6信号传导与气孔免疫联系起来。这一发现揭示了生物分子凝聚体如何在植物中调节空间特异性免疫反应。

Plants.title: Mitotic entry is controlled by the plant-specific phosphatase BSL1 and cyclin-dependent kinase B
Plants.summary: Nature Plants, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41477-025-02145-zThe mechanism controlling mitosis is not understood in plants. Tulin et al. show that mitosis is prevented by CDKB phosphorylation and promoted by BSL1-mediated dephosphorylation, revealing the mechanism of mitotic control in the plant kingdom.
Plants.abstract: Cell cycle regulation is well understood in opisthokonts (fungi and metazoans) but not in plants or Apicomplexa, as some cell cycle regulators are not conserved. In opisthokonts, cell cycle progression requires the dephosphorylation of cyclin-dependent kinase (CDK) by the CDC25 phosphatase. Plants have no CDC25, and thus their mechanisms of cell cycle regulation remain elusive. Here we show that the BSL1 phosphatase dephosphorylates CDKB1 to promote mitotic entry in Chlamydomonas. Alterations of BSL1 or CDKB1 block mitotic entry after DNA replication. BSL1 shows dynamic localization through the cell cycle at the basal bodies, spindle poles and cleavage furrow. CDKB1 is hyperphosphorylated at the Thr14 and Tyr15 residues in the bsl1 mutant and in wild-type cells treated with DNA replication inhibitors. BSL1 binds to CDKB1 and dephosphorylates CDKB1 pThr14/pTyr15 in vitro. Phospho-mimicking alterations of Thr14/Tyr15 inactivate CDKB1 function, whereas phospho-blocking alterations cause sensitivity to DNA replication inhibitors, which delay cytokinesis in wild-type cells more than in cells expressing unphosphorylatable mutant CDKB1. These results indicate that CDKB1 Thr14 and Tyr15 are phosphorylated to block mitotic entry before DNA replication is complete, and BSL1 dephosphorylates CDKB1 to promote mitosis. Our study demonstrates that BSL1, a phosphatase conserved in plants and Apicomplexa but absent in fungi and animals, is a CDKB1-activating mitosis-promoting factor that has evolved additional signalling functions in receptor kinase pathways in higher plants. The mechanism controlling mitosis is not understood in plants. Tulin et al. show that mitosis is prevented by CDKB phosphorylation and promoted by BSL1-mediated dephosphorylation, revealing the mechanism of mitotic control in the plant kingdom.
Plants.authors_short: Tulin, Frej et al., Wang, Zhi-Yong
Plants.title_cn: 植物特异性磷酸酶BSL1和细胞周期蛋白依赖性激酶B调控有丝分裂起始
Plants.abstract_cn: 细胞周期调控在后生生物（如真菌和动物）中已得到充分理解，但在植物或顶复门生物中则不然，因为一些细胞周期调节因子并不保守。在后生生物中，细胞周期进程需要CDC25磷酸酶对细胞周期蛋白依赖性激酶（CDK）进行去磷酸化。植物不含CDC25，因此其细胞周期调控机制仍不清楚。本研究表明，BSL1磷酸酶通过使CDKB1去磷酸化来促进莱茵衣藻的有丝分裂起始。BSL1或CDKB1的改变会在DNA复制后阻断有丝分裂起始。BSL1在细胞周期中表现出动态定位，存在于基体、纺锤体极和细胞分裂沟。在bsl1突变体和经DNA复制抑制剂处理的野生型细胞中，CDKB1在Thr14和Tyr15残基处发生过度磷酸化。BSL1与CDKB1结合，并在体外使CDKB1的pThr14/pTyr15去磷酸化。Thr14/Tyr15的磷酸化模拟突变会使CDKB1功能失活，而磷酸化阻断突变则导致对DNA复制抑制剂的敏感性，与表达不可磷酸化突变CDKB1的细胞相比，这些抑制剂在野生型细胞中更能延迟细胞分裂。这些结果表明，CDKB1的Thr14和Tyr15在DNA复制完成前被磷酸化以阻断有丝分裂起始，而BSL1通过使CDKB1去磷酸化来促进有丝分裂。我们的研究表明，BSL1是一种在植物和顶复门生物中保守但在真菌和动物中缺失的磷酸酶，它是一种激活CDKB1的有丝分裂促进因子，并且在高等植物的受体激酶通路中演化出了额外的信号功能。植物中有丝分裂的调控机制尚不清楚。Tulin等人揭示了CDKB磷酸化阻止有丝分裂，而BSL1介导的去磷酸化促进有丝分裂的机制，从而阐明了植物界有丝分裂的调控机制。

Plants.title: Improving the accuracy of automated labeling of specimen images datasets via a confidence-based process
Plants.summary: by Quentin Bateux, Jonathan Koss, Patrick W. Sweeney, Erika Edwards, Nelson Rios, Aaron M. DollarThe digitization of natural history collections over the past three decades has unlocked a treasure trove of specimen imagery and metadata. There is great interest in making this data more useful by further labeling it with additional trait data, and modern “deep learning” machine learning techniques utilizing convolutional neural nets (CNNs) and similar networks show particular promise to reduce the amount of required manual labeling by human experts, making the process much faster and less expensive. However, in most cases, the accuracy of these approaches is too low for reliable utilization of the automatic labeling, typically in the range of 80-85% accuracy. In this paper, we present and validate an approach that can greatly improve this accuracy, essentially by examining the “confidence” that the network has in the generated label as well as utilizing a user-defined threshold to reject labels that fall below a chosen level. We demonstrate that a naive model that produced 86% initial accuracy can achieve improved performance - over 95% accuracy (rejecting about 40% of the labels) or over 99% accuracy (rejecting about 65%) by selecting higher confidence thresholds. This gives flexibility to adapt existing models to the statistical requirements of various types of research and has the potential to move these automatic labeling approaches from being unusably inaccurate to being an invaluable new tool. After validating the approach in a number of ways, we annotate the reproductive state of a large dataset of over 600,000 herbarium specimens. The analysis of the results points at under-investigated correlations as well as general alignment with known trends. By sharing this new dataset alongside this work, we want to allow biologists to gather insights for their own research questions, at their chosen point of accuracy/coverage trade-off.

Plants.title_cn: 通过基于置信度的方法提高标本图像数据集自动化标注的准确性
Plants.abstract_cn: 过去三十年间，自然历史收藏品的数字化工作，为标本图像和元数据带来了巨大的宝藏。人们对通过额外性状数据进一步标注这些数据以提高其可用性抱有浓厚兴趣。现代“深度学习”机器学习技术，利用卷积神经网络（CNNs）及类似网络，在减少人工专家手动标注量方面展现出巨大潜力，从而使该过程更快、成本更低。然而，在大多数情况下，这些方法的准确性过低（通常在80-85%之间），无法可靠地利用自动化标注。本文提出并验证了一种能够显著提高准确性的方法，其核心在于检查网络对生成标签的“置信度”，并利用用户定义的阈值来拒绝低于选定水平的标签。我们证明，通过选择更高的置信度阈值，一个初始准确率为86%的朴素模型可以实现性能提升——达到95%以上的准确率（拒绝约40%的标签）或99%以上的准确率（拒绝约65%的标签）。这为现有模型适应各类研究的统计要求提供了灵活性，并有望使这些自动化标注方法从不可靠的低准确率工具转变为宝贵的新工具。在通过多种方式验证该方法后，我们对超过60万份植物标本的大型数据集的生殖状态进行了标注。结果分析揭示了一些未被充分研究的相关性，并与已知趋势总体一致。通过与这项工作一同分享这个新数据集，我们希望生物学家能够根据其选择的准确性/覆盖率权衡点，为自己的研究问题获取见解。

Epiallelic variants often cause gene expression changes and may be targets of selection, thus revealing their contribution to heritable phenotypic variation in nature.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: P. Baduel et al., Vincent Colot
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 转座元件是反复发生的跨代表观遗传的载体
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 转座元件（TEs）的DNA甲基化缺失会影响邻近基因，并在植物中进行表观遗传，但这种额外遗传系统的决定因素和意义尚不清楚。在此，我们在拟南芥中证明，转座元件位点实验诱导的低甲基化的跨代稳定性受到相关拷贝来源的小RNA的限制。利用全球收集的700多个品系的数据，我们发现数百个此类转座元件位点（通常位于基因附近）存在相似且反复出现的低甲基化。我们测试的大多数自然表观变异体可以在没有DNA序列变化的情况下遗传，因此是真正的表观等位基因，尽管遗传因素会调节它们的复发或持久性。表观等位基因变异通常会导致基因表达变化，并可能成为选择的目标，从而揭示它们对自然界中可遗传表型变异的贡献。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Depression genetics through the lens of age at onset
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Genetics, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41588-025-02402-zA study drawing on biobank and registry data from five Nordic countries reveals distinct genetic associations for early- and late-onset major depressive disorder and differences in their genetic architectures and relationships with other traits. Stratification by age at onset can uncover risk effects relevant to severe outcomes and inform prevention strategies.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: A study drawing on biobank and registry data from five Nordic countries reveals distinct genetic associations for early- and late-onset major depressive disorder and differences in their genetic architectures and relationships with other traits. Stratification by age at onset can uncover risk effects relevant to severe outcomes and inform prevention strategies.
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 发病年龄视角下的抑郁症遗传学
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 一项利用来自五个北欧国家的生物样本库和登记数据进行的研究揭示，早发型和晚发型重度抑郁症具有独特的遗传关联，并且在遗传结构以及与其他性状的关系上存在差异。根据发病年龄进行分层，有助于揭示与严重结局相关的风险效应，并为制定预防策略提供依据。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Genome-wide association analyses identify distinct genetic architectures for early-onset and late-onset depression
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Genetics, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41588-025-02396-8Genome-wide association analyses leveraging Nordic biobanks with longitudinal health registries identify differences in the genetic architectures of early-onset and late-onset major depressive disorder and in their genetic correlations with related traits.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: Major depressive disorder (MDD) is a common and heterogeneous disorder of complex etiology. Studying more homogeneous groups stratified according to clinical characteristics, such as age of onset, can improve the identification of the underlying genetic causes and lead to more targeted treatment strategies. We leveraged Nordic biobanks with longitudinal health registries to investigate differences in the genetic architectures of early-onset (eoMDD; n = 46,708 cases) and late-onset (loMDD; n = 37,168 cases) MDD. We identified 12 genomic loci for eoMDD and two for loMDD. Overall, the two MDD subtypes correlated moderately (genetic correlation, rg = 0.58) and differed in their genetic correlations with related traits. These findings suggest that eoMDD and loMDD have partially distinct genetic signatures, with a specific developmental brain signature for eoMDD. Importantly, we demonstrate that polygenic risk scores (PRS) for eoMDD predict suicide attempts within the first 10 years after the initial diagnosis: the absolute risk for suicide attempt was 26% in the top PRS decile, compared to 12% and 20% in the bottom decile and the intermediate group, respectively. Taken together, our findings can inform precision psychiatry approaches for MDD. Genome-wide association analyses leveraging Nordic biobanks with longitudinal health registries identify differences in the genetic architectures of early-onset and late-onset major depressive disorder and in their genetic correlations with related traits.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Shorter, John R. et al., Lu, Yi
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 全基因组关联分析揭示早发型和迟发型抑郁症的独特遗传结构
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 重度抑郁症（MDD）是一种常见且异质性高的疾病，其病因复杂。根据临床特征（如发病年龄）对更同质的群体进行研究，有助于更好地识别潜在的遗传病因，并制定更具针对性的治疗策略。我们利用北欧生物样本库及其纵向健康登记数据，调查了早发型（eoMDD；46,708例）和迟发型（loMDD；37,168例）MDD的遗传结构差异。我们为eoMDD识别出12个基因组位点，为loMDD识别出2个基因组位点。总体而言，这两种MDD亚型之间存在中度相关性（遗传相关性，rg = 0.58），并且它们与相关性状的遗传相关性也存在差异。这些发现表明，eoMDD和loMDD具有部分独特的遗传特征，其中eoMDD具有特定的发育性大脑特征。重要的是，我们证明了eoMDD的多基因风险评分（PRS）可以预测初次诊断后10年内的自杀企图：在PRS最高十分位数中，自杀企图的绝对风险为26%，而最低十分位数和中间组分别为12%和20%。综上所述，我们的研究结果可为MDD的精准精神病学方法提供信息。利用北欧生物样本库和纵向健康登记数据的全基因组关联分析，揭示了早发型和迟发型重度抑郁症在遗传结构及其与相关性状的遗传相关性方面的差异。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Bin Chicken: targeted metagenomic coassembly for the efficient recovery of novel genomes
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02901-1By developing a strategy of metagenomic coassembly and prioritizing divergent marker gene sequences, Bin Chicken efficiently recovers more than 77,000 microbial genomes with high novel diversity, thereby expanding the tree of life.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: The recovery of microbial genomes from metagenomic datasets has provided genomic representation for hundreds of thousands of species from diverse biomes. However, low-abundance microorganisms are often missed due to insufficient genomic coverage. Here we present Bin Chicken, an algorithm that substantially improves genome recovery through automated, targeted selection of metagenomes for coassembly based on shared marker gene sequences derived from raw reads. Marker gene sequences that are divergent from known reference genomes can be further prioritized, providing an efficient means of recovering highly novel genomes. Applying Bin Chicken to public metagenomes and coassembling 800 sample groups recovered 77,562 microbial genomes, including the first genomic representatives of 6 phyla, 41 classes and 24,028 species. These genomes expand the genomic tree of life and uncover a wealth of novel microbial lineages for further research. By developing a strategy of metagenomic coassembly and prioritizing divergent marker gene sequences, Bin Chicken efficiently recovers more than 77,000 microbial genomes with high novel diversity, thereby expanding the tree of life.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Aroney, Samuel T. N. et al., Woodcroft, Ben J.
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: Bin Chicken：靶向宏基因组共组装用于高效恢复新型基因组
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 从宏基因组数据集中恢复微生物基因组，为来自不同生物群落的数十万物种提供了基因组代表。然而，由于基因组覆盖度不足，低丰度微生物常常被遗漏。本文介绍了一种名为 Bin Chicken 的算法，该算法通过基于原始测序读段中共享的标记基因序列，自动、靶向选择宏基因组进行共组装，从而显著提高了基因组的恢复效率。与已知参考基因组存在差异的标记基因序列可以被进一步优先考虑，这为恢复高度新型基因组提供了一种高效手段。将 Bin Chicken 应用于公共宏基因组数据并对800个样本组进行共组装，共恢复了77,562个微生物基因组，其中包括6个门、41个纲和24,028个物种的首个基因组代表。这些基因组扩展了生命基因组之树，并揭示了大量可供进一步研究的新型微生物谱系。通过开发宏基因组共组装策略并优先考虑差异性标记基因序列，Bin Chicken 高效恢复了超过77,000个具有高度新颖多样性的微生物基因组，从而扩展了生命之树。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: A computational approach for perturbation-induced EMT transitions
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: npj Systems Biology and Applications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41540-025-00597-9A computational approach for perturbation-induced EMT transitions
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: The Epithelial-mesenchymal transition (EMT) is a cellular state transition fundamental to development, wound healing, and cancer metastasis. The gene regulatory mechanisms underlying EMT have been extensively documented, revealing gene regulatory networks (GRNs) involving groups of mutually inhibiting transcription factors and microRNAs. Despite significant progress from both experimental and computational approaches, the details of how the EMT GRN initiates EMT in response to various external inputs is still not well understood. Here, we apply both Boolean and ordinary differential equation (ODE)-based methods to simulate a well-studied 26-node, 100-edge EMT GRN, examining its response to a wide range of single- and double-node perturbations. We evaluate the characteristics of effective EMT-inducing signals, particularly examining the amplifying role of transcriptional noise in determining the likelihood and mean transit time of an EMT. Together, these models establish a complementary framework for understanding and predicting drivers of EMT in the context of a GRN. We anticipate that this framework for a systematic study of in-silico GRN perturbations will be useful in developing increasingly accurate dynamical GRN models for various biological processes.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Ramirez, Daniel et al., Levine, Herbert
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 扰动诱导上皮-间充质转化的计算方法
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 上皮-间充质转化（EMT）是一种细胞状态转换，对发育、伤口愈合和癌症转移至关重要。EMT的基因调控机制已被广泛研究，揭示了涉及相互抑制的转录因子和微RNA群体的基因调控网络（GRNs）。尽管实验和计算方法都取得了显著进展，但EMT基因调控网络如何响应各种外部输入启动EMT的详细机制仍不清楚。本文中，我们采用布尔模型和常微分方程（ODE）模型模拟了一个经过充分研究的、包含26个节点和100条边的EMT基因调控网络，并考察了其对广泛的单节点和双节点扰动的响应。我们评估了有效EMT诱导信号的特征，特别考察了转录噪声在决定EMT发生可能性和平均转运时间中的放大作用。总而言之，这些模型为在基因调控网络背景下理解和预测EMT驱动因素提供了一个互补的框架。我们预期，这种用于系统性研究计算机模拟基因调控网络扰动的框架，将有助于开发针对各种生物过程的日益精确的动态基因调控网络模型。

Immunology.title: Multi-omics analysis of a pig-to-human decedent kidney xenotransplant
Immunology.summary: Nature, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09846-7Multi-omics analysis of a pig-to-human decedent kidney xenotransplant
Immunology.abstract: Organ shortage remains a major challenge in transplantation, and gene-edited pig organs offer a promising solution1–3. Despite gene-editing, the immune reactions following xenotransplantation can still cause transplant failure4. To understand the immunological response of a pig-to-human kidney xenotransplantation, we conducted large-scale multi-omics profiling of the xenograft and the host’s blood over a 61-day procedure in a brain-dead human (decedent) recipient. Blood plasmablasts, natural killer (NK) cells, and dendritic cells increased between postoperative day (POD)10 and 28, concordant with expansion of IgG/IgA B-cell clonotypes, and subsequent biopsy-confirmed antibody-mediated rejection (AbMR) at POD33. Human T-cell frequencies increased from POD21 and peaked between POD33-49 in the blood and xenograft, coinciding with T-cell receptor diversification, expansion of a restricted TRBV2/J1 clonotype and histological evidence of a combined AbMR and cell-mediated rejection at POD49. At POD33, the most abundant human immune population in the graft was CXCL9+ macrophages, aligning with IFN-γ-driven inflammation and a Type I immune response. In addition, we see evidence of interactions between activated pig-resident macrophages and infiltrating human immune cells. Xenograft tissue showed pro-fibrotic tubular and interstitial injury, marked by S100A65, SPP16 (Osteopontin), and COLEC117, at POD21–POD33. Proteomics profiling revealed human and pig complement activation, with decreased human component after AbMR therapy with complement inhibition. Collectively, these data delineate the molecular orchestration of human immune responses to a porcine kidney, revealing potential immunomodulatory targets for improving xenograft survival.
Immunology.authors_short: Schmauch, Eloi et al., Keating, Brendan J.
Immunology.title_cn: 猪-人脑死亡受者肾脏异种移植的多组学分析
Immunology.abstract_cn: 器官短缺仍然是移植领域的一大挑战，而基因编辑猪器官提供了一个有前景的解决方案1–3。尽管进行了基因编辑，异种移植后的免疫反应仍可能导致移植失败4。为了理解猪-人肾脏异种移植的免疫反应，我们对一名脑死亡人类受者进行了为期61天的大规模异种移植物和宿主血液多组学分析。术后第10天至第28天，血液中的浆母细胞、自然杀伤（NK）细胞和树突状细胞数量增加，这与IgG/IgA B细胞克隆型的扩增一致，并在术后第33天通过活检证实了抗体介导的排斥反应（AbMR）。人类T细胞频率从术后第21天开始增加，并在术后第33-49天在血液和异种移植物中达到峰值，同时伴随着T细胞受体多样化、受限TRBV2/J1克隆型的扩增以及术后第49天组织学上证实了AbMR和细胞介导排斥反应的结合。在术后第33天，移植物中最丰富的人类免疫细胞群是CXCL9+巨噬细胞，这与IFN-γ驱动的炎症和I型免疫反应相符。此外，我们还观察到活化的猪驻留巨噬细胞与浸润的人类免疫细胞之间存在相互作用的证据。异种移植物组织在术后第21-33天表现出促纤维化肾小管和间质损伤，其特征是S100A65、SPP16（骨桥蛋白）和COLEC117的表达。蛋白质组学分析揭示了人源和猪源补体的激活，在进行补体抑制的AbMR治疗后，人源补体成分有所下降。综合来看，这些数据描绘了人类对猪肾脏免疫反应的分子调控机制，揭示了改善异种移植物存活的潜在免疫调节靶点。

Immunology.title: Physiology and immunology of pig-to-human decedent kidney xenotransplant
Immunology.summary: Nature, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09847-6Physiology and immunology of pig-to-human decedent kidney xenotransplant
Immunology.abstract: Xenotransplantation of genetically-modified pig kidneys offers a solution to the scarcity of organs for end-stage renal disease patients.1 We performed a 61-day alpha-Gal knock-out pig kidney and thymic autograft transplant into a nephrectomized brain-dead human using clinically approved immunosuppression, without CD40 blockade or additional genetic modification. Hemodynamic and electrolyte stability and dialysis independence were achieved. Post-operative day (POD) 10 biopsies revealed glomerular IgM and IgA deposition, activation of early complement components and mesangiolysis with stable renal function without proteinuria, a phenotype not seen in allotransplantation. On POD 33, an abrupt increase in serum creatinine was associated with antibody-mediated rejection and increased donor-specific IgG. Plasma exchange, C3/C3b inhibition and rabbit anti-thymocyte globulin (rATG), completely reversed xenograft rejection. Pre-existing donor-reactive T cell clones expanded progressively in the circulation post-transplant, acquired an effector transcriptional profile and were detected in the POD 33 rejecting xenograft prior to rATG treatment. This study provides the first long-term physiologic, immunologic, and infectious disease monitoring of a pig-to-human kidney xenotransplant and indicates that pre-existing xenoreactive T cells and induced antibodies to unknown epitope(s) present a major challenge, despite significant immunosuppression. It also demonstrates that a minimally gene-edited pig kidney can support long-term life-sustaining physiologic functions in a human.
Immunology.authors_short: Montgomery, Robert A. et al., Sykes, Megan
Immunology.title_cn: 猪-人逝者肾脏异种移植的生理学与免疫学研究
Immunology.abstract_cn: 基因编辑猪肾的异种移植为终末期肾病患者的器官短缺问题提供了解决方案。我们进行了一项为期61天的α-Gal基因敲除猪肾和胸腺自体移植，将其植入一名已切除肾脏的脑死亡人体内，并使用了临床批准的免疫抑制方案，未进行CD40阻断或额外的基因修饰。研究实现了血流动力学和电解质的稳定，并摆脱了透析依赖。术后第10天的活检显示肾小球IgM和IgA沉积、早期补体成分激活以及系膜溶解，但肾功能稳定且无蛋白尿，这是一种在同种异体移植中未见的表型。术后第33天，血清肌酐突然升高，这与抗体介导的排斥反应和供体特异性IgG的增加有关。血浆置换、C3/C3b抑制以及兔抗胸腺细胞球蛋白（rATG）完全逆转了异种移植物的排斥反应。移植后，循环中预先存在的供体反应性T细胞克隆逐渐扩增，获得了效应转录谱，并在rATG治疗前于术后第33天排斥的异种移植物中被检测到。本研究首次对猪-人肾脏异种移植进行了长期的生理、免疫和感染性疾病监测，结果表明，尽管进行了显著的免疫抑制，预先存在的异种反应性T细胞和针对未知表位产生的抗体仍然构成了主要挑战。本研究还表明，一个经过微量基因编辑的猪肾可以在人体内支持长期的生命维持生理功能。

Immunology.title: Pathogen-induced condensation of the guard cell RNA-binding protein SAIR1 fine-tunes translation for immunity
Immunology.summary: Nature Plants, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41477-025-02154-yThe RNA-binding protein SAIR1 forms phosphorylation-regulated condensates in guard cells, which link PAMP–MPK3/6 signalling to stomatal immunity. This finding reveals how biomolecular condensates regulate spatially specific immune responses in plants.
Immunology.abstract: Plant guard cells perceive pathogens and close stomata to prevent their invasion. Biomolecular condensates are membraneless organelles essential for life processes. However, guard cell biomolecular condensates mediating stomatal immunity remain unknown. Here we identify a guard-cell-preferential RNA-recognition-motif-type RNA-BINDING PROTEIN, STOMATAL IMMUNE RNA-BINDING PROTEIN 1 (SAIR1), that forms pathogen-responsive guard cell condensates via phase separation. Upon perception of the pathogen molecular pattern flg22, the activated kinases MPK3 and MPK6 phosphorylate SAIR1 and trigger its condensation in guard cells for stomatal immunity. SAIR1 condensates recruit translational regulators such as POLYADENYLATE-BINDING PROTEINs and eIFiso4G, and sequester defence-related mRNAs, including key components of the salicylic acid pathway. Through these interactions, SAIR1 condensates enhance the translation of defence mRNAs, ultimately promoting stomatal closure. Our findings reveal phosphorylation-regulated SAIR1 condensates as a critical hub that links flg22–MPK3/6 signalling to stomatal immunity. The RNA-binding protein SAIR1 forms phosphorylation-regulated condensates in guard cells, which link PAMP–MPK3/6 signalling to stomatal immunity. This finding reveals how biomolecular condensates regulate spatially specific immune responses in plants.
Immunology.authors_short: Yu, Qiangsheng et al., Qi, Tiancong
Immunology.title_cn: 病原体诱导的保卫细胞RNA结合蛋白SAIR1凝聚体精细调节翻译以实现免疫
Immunology.abstract_cn: 植物保卫细胞感知病原体并关闭气孔以阻止其入侵。生物分子凝聚体是生命过程必需的无膜细胞器。然而，介导气孔免疫的保卫细胞生物分子凝聚体仍不清楚。在本研究中，我们鉴定了一种保卫细胞特异性、RNA识别基序型RNA结合蛋白——气孔免疫RNA结合蛋白1 (SAIR1)，它通过相分离形成病原体响应性保卫细胞凝聚体。感知到病原体分子模式flg22后，活化的激酶MPK3和MPK6磷酸化SAIR1，并在保卫细胞中触发其凝聚，从而介导气孔免疫。SAIR1凝聚体招募翻译调节因子，如多聚腺苷酸结合蛋白(POLYADENYLATE-BINDING PROTEINs)和eIFiso4G，并隔离防御相关mRNA，包括水杨酸途径的关键组分。通过这些相互作用，SAIR1凝聚体增强防御mRNA的翻译，最终促进气孔关闭。我们的发现揭示了磷酸化调节的SAIR1凝聚体是一个关键枢纽，它将flg22–MPK3/6信号传导与气孔免疫联系起来。RNA结合蛋白SAIR1在保卫细胞中形成磷酸化调节的凝聚体，将PAMP–MPK3/6信号传导与气孔免疫联系起来。这一发现揭示了生物分子凝聚体如何在植物中调节空间特异性免疫反应。

Molecular Design.title: Cascaded nonlinear down-conversion in poling-free lithium niobate nanophotonic waveguides
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64912-yCascaded nonlinear optics has long enabled advances in short-wavelength generation, but equivalent approaches for long wavelengths remain underdeveloped. Here, the authors demonstrate a chip-based lithium niobate platform that delivers tunable mid-infrared light, opening new possibilities for sensing, spectroscopy, and communications.
Molecular Design.abstract: While cascaded second-order nonlinear processes have revolutionized shorter-wavelength light generation through up-conversion, their potential for longer-wavelength emission via parametric down-conversion remains fundamentally unexplored – constrained by narrow phase-matching bandwidths, insufficient parametric gain and stringent requirements on complex poling. Here, we break this paradigm through a reverse-polarization dual-layer lithium niobate nanophotonic waveguide that achieves broadband phase matching and record 15.3% conversion efficiency for mid-infrared (MIR) generation. Pumped at 1.03 μm, the cascaded optical parametric generation and difference frequency generation processes produce dynamically tunable MIR emissions spanning 2.06–3.09 μm – a relative bandwidth of 40%. By strategically engineering dispersion characteristics, we further extend the versatility of this platform: pumping at telecommunications-compatible wavelengths (1.3–1.6 μm) generates discrete MIR lines at 3.59, 3.93, 4.31, and 4.6 μm, penetrating the crucial molecular fingerprint region. This work not only establishes cascaded down-conversion as a viable strategy for efficient long-wavelength generation but also provides a blueprint for designing reconfigurable nonlinear photonic systems, with transformative implications for spectroscopy, sensing, and wavelength-division multiplexing technologies. Cascaded nonlinear optics has long enabled advances in short-wavelength generation, but equivalent approaches for long wavelengths remain underdeveloped. Here, the authors demonstrate a chip-based lithium niobate platform that delivers tunable mid-infrared light, opening new possibilities for sensing, spectroscopy, and communications.
Molecular Design.authors_short: Yan, Congliao et al., Wang, Qi Jie
Molecular Design.title_cn: 无极化铌酸锂纳米光波导中的级联非线性下转换
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 尽管级联二阶非线性过程通过上转换彻底改变了短波长光的产生，但其通过参量下转换实现长波长发射的潜力仍未得到根本性探索——这受限于窄的相位匹配带宽、不足的参量增益以及对复杂极化（poling）的严格要求。在此，我们通过一种反向极化双层铌酸锂纳米光波导打破了这一范式，该波导实现了宽带相位匹配，并为中红外（MIR）光的产生达到了创纪录的15.3%转换效率。在1.03微米泵浦下，级联光学参量产生和差频产生过程产生了动态可调谐的中红外发射，波长范围为2.06–3.09微米——相对带宽达40%。通过策略性地设计色散特性，我们进一步扩展了该平台的通用性：在电信兼容波长（1.3–1.6微米）泵浦下，产生了3.59、3.93、4.31和4.6微米的离散中红外谱线，这些谱线深入了关键的分子指纹区。这项工作不仅确立了级联下转换作为高效长波长产生的可行策略，而且为设计可重构非线性光子系统提供了蓝图，对光谱学、传感和波分复用技术具有变革性意义。级联非线性光学长期以来推动了短波长产生的发展，但用于长波长的等效方法仍不成熟。在此，作者展示了一种基于芯片的铌酸锂平台，该平台可提供可调谐的中红外光，为传感、光谱学和通信开辟了新的可能性。

Molecular Design.title: Film surface assemblies from chemically distinct block copolymer micelles
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65278-xBlock copolymer self-assembly enables complex nanostructures including spherical micelles, continuous cubic gyroids and Frank-Kasper phases. Here, the authors show how film surface self-assemblies of binary and ternary block copolymer micelle alloys pave a path to controlled multicomponent assemblies.
Molecular Design.abstract: Block copolymer (BCP) self-assembly – neat, or in a homopolymer/second BCP containing molecular blend – enables complex nanostructures including spherical micelles, co-continuous cubic gyroids and Frank-Kasper phases. Emergent properties in metallic and high entropy alloys inspire a paradigm shift: treating chemically distinct BCP micelles as functional building blocks to pave a path for multicomponent assemblies with molecularly engineered property profiles. Slowing current progress are challenges associated with the structural characterization of such BCP assemblies with poor atomic contrast. Here, we demonstrate how film surface self-assemblies of binary and ternary BCP micelle alloys can be phase inverted to generate porosity. This, combined with machine-learning assisted image segmentation, allows component classification via routine scanning electron microscopy. Results are supported by mechanistic insights from Voronoi analysis, cluster analysis and Monte Carlo/Brownian Dynamics simulations, revealing rich and controllable non-equilibrium surface structural behavior. Such multicomponent materials are expected to enable emergent properties for a range of applications. Molecular Design.title_cn: 由化学性质不同的嵌段共聚物胶束形成的薄膜表面组装体
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 嵌段共聚物（BCP）的自组装——无论是纯净的，还是在含有均聚物/第二种BCP的分子共混物中——都能够形成复杂的纳米结构，包括球形胶束、共连续立方回旋体和Frank-Kasper相。金属和高熵合金中涌现的特性启发了一种范式转变：将化学性质不同的BCP胶束视为功能性构建单元，为构建具有分子工程化性能特征的多组分组装体铺平道路。目前进展缓慢的原因是，这类原子对比度差的BCP组装体的结构表征面临挑战。在此，我们展示了二元和三元BCP胶束合金的薄膜表面自组装体如何通过相转化来产生孔隙。这与机器学习辅助的图像分割相结合，使得通过常规扫描电子显微镜进行组分分类成为可能。研究结果得到了来自Voronoi分析、聚类分析以及蒙特卡洛/布朗动力学模拟的机理洞察的支持，揭示了丰富且可控的非平衡表面结构行为。这类多组分材料有望为一系列应用带来涌现的特性。嵌段共聚物自组装能够形成复杂的纳米结构，包括球形胶束、连续立方回旋体和Frank-Kasper相。本文作者展示了二元和三元嵌段共聚物胶束合金的薄膜表面自组装体如何为受控的多组分组装体铺平道路。

Molecular Design.title: Boosting the brightness of aggregation-caused quenching chromophore-based covalent organic frameworks via energy level matching strategy
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64952-4As a result of aggregation-caused quenching (ACQ), many fluorophores show only weak emission when incorporated into covalent organic frameworks. Here, the authors report the development of emissive COFs from ACQ chromophores by an energy level matching strategy.
Molecular Design.abstract: Most chromophores exhibit an aggregation-caused quenching (ACQ) effect, resulting in minimal or weak emission when incorporated into covalent organic frameworks (COFs). Consequently, the development of luminescent COFs, particularly those utilizing ACQ chromophores, presents both a compelling and formidable challenge. Herein, we report the construction of highly emissive ACQ chromophore-based COFs by an energy level matching strategy. This approach effectively modulates the electronic structures within the COFs, thereby suppressing intralayer charge transfer to ACQ chromophores, such as the imine linkage and dibenzo[g,p]chrysene unit, while simultaneously inhibiting interlayer charge transfer and non-radiative decay pathways. As a result, the undesired ACQ effect is mitigated, enabling the realization of highly emissive COFs. Notably, COF-BT-PhDBC demonstrates high brightness with a solid-state photoluminescence quantum yield of 14.7%, standing among the best ACQ chromophore-based COFs. Furthermore, COF-BT-PhDBC has been successfully utilized for in vivo three-photon fluorescence imaging of murine brain vasculature, achieving an impressive imaging depth of approximately 800 µm. As a result of aggregation-caused quenching (ACQ), many fluorophores show only weak emission when incorporated into covalent organic frameworks. Here, the authors report the development of emissive COFs from ACQ chromophores by an energy level matching strategy.

Molecular Design.title_cn: 通过能级匹配策略增强聚集诱导猝灭发色团基共价有机框架的发光亮度
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 大多数发色团表现出聚集诱导猝灭（ACQ）效应，导致其在掺入共价有机框架（COFs）后发光微弱或不发光。因此，开发发光COFs，特别是利用ACQ发色团的COFs，既是一个引人注目又极具挑战性的课题。在此，我们报道了通过能级匹配策略构建高发光效率的ACQ发色团基COFs。该方法有效调控了COFs内部的电子结构，从而抑制了层内电荷向ACQ发色团（如亚胺键和二苯并[g,p]屈单元）的转移，同时抑制了层间电荷转移和非辐射衰变途径。结果，不希望的ACQ效应得到缓解，从而实现了高发光效率的COFs。值得注意的是，COF-BT-PhDBC表现出高亮度，其固态光致发光量子产率达到14.7%，位列最佳ACQ发色团基COFs之列。此外，COF-BT-PhDBC已成功应用于小鼠脑血管的体内三光子荧光成像，实现了约800微米的惊人成像深度。由于聚集诱导猝灭（ACQ）效应，许多荧光团在掺入共价有机框架时仅表现出微弱的发光。本文中，作者报道了通过能级匹配策略从ACQ发色团开发出具有发光性能的COFs。

Molecular Design.title: Advancing sulfide solid electrolytes via green Li<sub>2</sub>S synthesis
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64924-8Sulfide solid electrolytes show potential for safer, higher-performance batteries, but costly Li2S precursors hinder commercial adoption. Here, authors develop a scalable, potentially eco-friendly Li2S synthesis method that reduces its production costs, which could facilitate wider deployment of sulfide solid electrolytes.
Molecular Design.abstract: We present a potentially eco-friendly, cost-efficient strategy for synthesizing high-purity Li2S, a key precursor for sulfide-based solid electrolytes. While these electrolytes surpass conventional organic counterparts in both safety and performance, their widespread application is hindered by the high cost of Li2S. Here, a solvent-free metathesis route is developed, in which thiourea serves as an S2⁻ donor to sulfurize LiOH, enabling scalable Li2S production (∼100 g per batch) with significantly reduced projected costs. During the process, intermediates (H2NCN, H2O) are transformed into benign gases (CO2, NH3) that spontaneously leave the system, thereby driving Li2S formation without ΔGmix limitations. The as-synthesized Li2S is successfully applied to prepare sulfide-based solid electrolytes such as Li10GeP2S12 and argyrodite-Li5.5PS4.5Cl1.5, achieving laboratory-scale (1 kg) production costs reduction of up to 27.5% and 92.9%, respectively. Furthermore, all-solid-state batteries employing Li5.5PS4.5Cl1.5 demonstrate electrochemical performance comparable to those fabricate with commercial Li2S. This scalable methodology thus may provide a proming pathway to bridge low-cost Li2S synthesis with the practical deployment of sulfide-based solid electrolytes, which may accelerate the commercialization of high-performance all-solid-state batteries. Sulfide solid electrolytes show potential for safer, higher-performance batteries, but costly Li2S precursors hinder commercial adoption. Here, authors develop a scalable, potentially eco-friendly Li2S synthesis method that reduces its production costs, which could facilitate wider deployment of sulfide solid electrolytes.

Molecular Design.title_cn: 通过绿色硫化锂合成技术推进硫化物固态电解质的发展
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 本研究提出了一种潜在环保且成本效益高的策略，旨在合成高纯度硫化锂（Li2S），该物质是硫化物基固态电解质的关键前体。尽管硫化物固态电解质在安全性和性能上均优于传统的有机电解质，但其广泛应用受到高成本Li2S的制约。在此，我们开发了一种无溶剂复分解路线，利用硫脲作为S2⁻供体对氢氧化锂（LiOH）进行硫化，从而实现了可规模化（每批次约100克）的Li2S生产，并显著降低了预计成本。在反应过程中，中间产物（H2NCN, H2O）转化为无害气体（CO2, NH3），这些气体自发逸出体系，从而在无ΔGmix限制的条件下驱动Li2S的形成。所合成的Li2S成功应用于制备硫化物基固态电解质，如Li10GeP2S12和硫银锗矿型Li5.5PS4.5Cl1.5，分别实现了实验室规模（1公斤）生产成本高达27.5%和92.9%的降低。此外，采用Li5.5PS4.5Cl1.5的全固态电池展现出与使用商业Li2S制备的电池相当的电化学性能。因此，这种可规模化的方法有望为低成本Li2S合成与硫化物基固态电解质的实际部署之间搭建桥梁，从而加速高性能全固态电池的商业化进程。硫化物固态电解质在实现更安全、更高性能电池方面具有巨大潜力，然而，昂贵的Li2S前体阻碍了其商业化进程。本研究开发了一种可规模化、潜在环保的Li2S合成方法，显著降低了其生产成本，有望促进硫化物固态电解质的更广泛应用。

Molecular Design.title: Decoupling structural molecular dynamics from excited state lifetimes using few-femtosecond ultraviolet resonant dispersive waves
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64943-5Resonant dispersive wave (RDW) emission enables tunable few-femtosecond UV pulses which can be useful for ultrafast science. Here, the authors investigate ultrafast relaxation and structural evolution of morpholine with enhanced temporal resolution, following excitation via RDWs.
Molecular Design.abstract: Optical sources exploiting resonant dispersive wave (RDW) emission are set to revolutionize ultrafast science. We demonstrate this approach by investigating excited state dynamics in morpholine using time-resolved photoelectron imaging. Excitation at 250 nm was achieved via RDW emission inside a helium-filled capillary fibre which, when combined with a short 800 nm probe, realized an instrument response of just 11 ± 2 fs. Two pathways initiate N–H bond fission: an extremely fast (<10 fs) process and a frustrated mechanism (380 fs) with hindered electronic ground state access. Photoelectron angular distributions also indicate average molecular geometry evolving on an intermediate (~100 fs) timescale. This clean distinction between population lifetimes and structural dynamics is enabled by the excellent temporal resolution inherent in RDW-based sources. Electronic structure and nonadiabatic surface hopping calculations support our data interpretation, and the synergy between experiment and theory is vital for developing a complete mechanistic picture. Resonant dispersive wave (RDW) emission enables tunable few-femtosecond UV pulses which can be useful for ultrafast science. Here, the authors investigate ultrafast relaxation and structural evolution of morpholine with enhanced temporal resolution, following excitation via RDWs.
