Molecular Design.title_cn: 利用飞秒级紫外共振色散波实现结构分子动力学与激发态寿命的解耦
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 利用共振色散波（RDW）发射的光源有望彻底改变超快科学。我们通过使用时间分辨光电子成像技术研究吗啉的激发态动力学来验证这一方法。通过在充氦毛细管光纤内利用RDW发射实现了250 nm的激发，当其与短脉冲800 nm探测光结合时，仪器响应时间仅为11 ± 2 fs。N–H键断裂由两条途径引发：一条是极快的（<10 fs）过程，另一条是受阻的（380 fs）机制，其电子基态的访问受到阻碍。光电子角分布也表明平均分子几何结构在中等（约100 fs）时间尺度上演化。RDW光源固有的出色时间分辨率使得群体寿命与结构动力学之间能够清晰区分。电子结构和非绝热表面跳跃计算支持我们的数据解释，实验与理论之间的协同作用对于建立完整的机理图景至关重要。共振色散波（RDW）发射能够产生可调谐的飞秒级紫外脉冲，对超快科学具有重要意义。本文作者利用RDW激发，以增强的时间分辨率研究了吗啉的超快弛豫和结构演化。

Molecular Design.title: SynGFN: learning across chemical space with generative flow-based molecular discovery
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Computational Science, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s43588-025-00902-wA persistent gap from theoretical molecules to experimentally viable compounds has hindered the practical adoption of generative algorithms. This study proposes SynGFN as a bridge linking molecular design and synthesis, accelerating exploration and producing diverse, synthesizable, high-performance molecules.
Molecular Design.abstract: In recent years, artificial intelligence has advanced the design–make–test–analyze cycle, transforming molecular discovery. Despite these advances, the compartmentalized approach to computer-aided molecular design and synthesis remains a critical bottleneck, limiting further optimization of the design–make–test–analyze cycle. Here, to this end, we introduce SynGFN, which models molecular design as a cascade of simulated chemical reactions, enabling the assembly of molecules from synthesizable building blocks. SynGFN features two key ingredients: (1) a hierarchically pretrained policy network that accelerates learning across diverse distributions of desirable molecules in chemical spaces, and (2) a multifidelity acquisition framework to alleviate the cost of reward evaluations. These technical developments collectively endow SynGFN with the capability to explore a chemical space up to an order of magnitude larger (measured in terms of #Circles) than that of other synthesis-aware generative models, while identifying the most diverse, synthesizable and high-performance molecules. We demonstrate SynGFN’s potential impacts by designing inhibitors for GluN1/GluN3A, a therapeutic target for neuropsychiatric disorders. A persistent gap from theoretical molecules to experimentally viable compounds has hindered the practical adoption of generative algorithms. This study proposes SynGFN as a bridge linking molecular design and synthesis, accelerating exploration and producing diverse, synthesizable, high-performance molecules.
Molecular Design.authors_short: Zhu, Yuchen et al., Hsieh, Chang-Yu
Molecular Design.title_cn: SynGFN：基于生成流的分子发现，实现跨化学空间学习
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 近年来，人工智能推动了“设计-合成-测试-分析”循环的发展，从而革新了分子发现领域。尽管取得了这些进展，但计算机辅助分子设计和合成的割裂方法仍然是一个关键瓶颈，限制了“设计-合成-测试-分析”循环的进一步优化。为此，我们引入了SynGFN，它将分子设计建模为一系列模拟化学反应，从而能够从可合成的构建块组装分子。SynGFN具有两个关键要素：(1) 一个分层预训练的策略网络，可加速在化学空间中多样化理想分子分布上的学习；(2) 一个多保真度采集框架，以减轻奖励评估的成本。这些技术发展共同赋予SynGFN探索比其他合成感知生成模型大一个数量级（以#Circles衡量）的化学空间的能力，同时识别出最多样化、可合成且高性能的分子。我们通过设计GluN1/GluN3A（一种神经精神疾病的治疗靶点）的抑制剂，展示了SynGFN的潜在影响。从理论分子到实验可行化合物之间长期存在的鸿沟阻碍了生成算法的实际应用。本研究提出SynGFN作为连接分子设计与合成的桥梁，加速了探索并生成了多样化、可合成且高性能的分子。

Molecular Design.title: OneProt: Towards multi-modal protein foundation models via latent space alignment of sequence, structure, binding sites and text encoders
Molecular Design.summary: by Klemens Flöge, Srisruthi Udayakumar, Johanna Sommer, Marie Piraud, Stefan Kesselheim, Vincent Fortuin, Stephan Günnemann, Karel J. van der Weg, Holger Gohlke, Erinc Merdivan, Alina BazarovaRecent advances in Artificial Intelligence have enabled multi-modal systems to model and translate diverse information spaces. Extending beyond text and vision, we introduce OneProt, a multi-modal Deep Learning model for proteins that integrates structural, sequence, text, and binding site data. Using the ImageBind framework, OneProt aligns the latent spaces of protein modality encoders in a lightweight fine-tuning scheme that focuses on pairwise alignment with sequence data, rather than requiring full matches. This novel approach comprises a mix of Graph Neural Networks and transformer architectures. It demonstrates good performance in retrieval tasks and showcases the efficacy of multi-modal systems in Protein Machine Learning through a broad spectrum of downstream baselines, including enzyme function prediction and binding site analysis. Furthermore, OneProt enables the transfer of representational information from specialized encoders to the sequence encoder, enhancing capabilities for distinguishing evolutionarily related and unrelated sequences and exhibiting representational properties where evolutionarily related proteins align in similar directions within the latent space. In addition, we extensively investigate modality ablations to identify the encoders that contribute the most to predictive performance, highlighting the significance of the binding site encoder, which has not been used in similar models previously. This work expands the horizons of multi-modal protein models, paving the way for transformative applications in drug discovery, biocatalytic reaction planning, and protein engineering.

Molecular Design.title_cn: OneProt：通过序列、结构、结合位点和文本编码器的潜在空间对齐迈向多模态蛋白质基础模型
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 人工智能的最新进展使得多模态系统能够对多样化的信息空间进行建模和转换。我们将多模态系统的应用范围从文本和视觉领域扩展开来，引入了OneProt，这是一个用于蛋白质的多模态深度学习模型，它整合了结构、序列、文本和结合位点数据。OneProt利用ImageBind框架，通过一种轻量级的微调方案来对齐蛋白质模态编码器的潜在空间，该方案侧重于与序列数据的成对对齐，而非要求完全匹配。这种新颖的方法结合了图神经网络和Transformer架构。它在检索任务中表现出良好的性能，并通过广泛的下游基准测试（包括酶功能预测和结合位点分析）展示了多模态系统在蛋白质机器学习中的有效性。此外，OneProt能够将来自专用编码器的表征信息转移到序列编码器，从而增强了区分进化相关和不相关序列的能力，并展现出进化相关蛋白质在潜在空间中沿相似方向对齐的表征特性。我们还广泛研究了模态消融实验，以识别对预测性能贡献最大的编码器，并强调了结合位点编码器的重要性，该编码器此前在类似模型中尚未被使用。这项工作拓展了多模态蛋白质模型的视野，为药物发现、生物催化反应规划和蛋白质工程领域的变革性应用铺平了道路。

Structure.title: Cascaded nonlinear down-conversion in poling-free lithium niobate nanophotonic waveguides
Structure.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64912-yCascaded nonlinear optics has long enabled advances in short-wavelength generation, but equivalent approaches for long wavelengths remain underdeveloped. Here, the authors demonstrate a chip-based lithium niobate platform that delivers tunable mid-infrared light, opening new possibilities for sensing, spectroscopy, and communications.
Structure.abstract: While cascaded second-order nonlinear processes have revolutionized shorter-wavelength light generation through up-conversion, their potential for longer-wavelength emission via parametric down-conversion remains fundamentally unexplored – constrained by narrow phase-matching bandwidths, insufficient parametric gain and stringent requirements on complex poling. Here, we break this paradigm through a reverse-polarization dual-layer lithium niobate nanophotonic waveguide that achieves broadband phase matching and record 15.3% conversion efficiency for mid-infrared (MIR) generation. Pumped at 1.03 μm, the cascaded optical parametric generation and difference frequency generation processes produce dynamically tunable MIR emissions spanning 2.06–3.09 μm – a relative bandwidth of 40%. By strategically engineering dispersion characteristics, we further extend the versatility of this platform: pumping at telecommunications-compatible wavelengths (1.3–1.6 μm) generates discrete MIR lines at 3.59, 3.93, 4.31, and 4.6 μm, penetrating the crucial molecular fingerprint region. This work not only establishes cascaded down-conversion as a viable strategy for efficient long-wavelength generation but also provides a blueprint for designing reconfigurable nonlinear photonic systems, with transformative implications for spectroscopy, sensing, and wavelength-division multiplexing technologies. Cascaded nonlinear optics has long enabled advances in short-wavelength generation, but equivalent approaches for long wavelengths remain underdeveloped. Here, the authors demonstrate a chip-based lithium niobate platform that delivers tunable mid-infrared light, opening new possibilities for sensing, spectroscopy, and communications.

Structure.title_cn: 无极化铌酸锂纳米光波导中的级联非线性下转换
Structure.abstract_cn: 尽管级联二阶非线性过程通过上转换彻底改变了短波长光的产生，但其通过参量下转换实现长波长发射的潜力仍未得到根本性探索——这受限于窄的相位匹配带宽、不足的参量增益以及对复杂极化（poling）的严格要求。在此，我们通过一种反向极化双层铌酸锂纳米光波导打破了这一范式，该波导实现了宽带相位匹配，并为中红外（MIR）光的产生达到了创纪录的15.3%转换效率。在1.03微米泵浦下，级联光学参量产生和差频产生过程产生了动态可调谐的中红外发射，波长范围为2.06–3.09微米——相对带宽达40%。通过策略性地设计色散特性，我们进一步扩展了该平台的通用性：在电信兼容波长（1.3–1.6微米）泵浦下，产生了3.59、3.93、4.31和4.6微米的离散中红外谱线，这些谱线深入了关键的分子指纹区。这项工作不仅确立了级联下转换作为高效长波长产生的可行策略，而且为设计可重构非线性光子系统提供了蓝图，对光谱学、传感和波分复用技术具有变革性意义。级联非线性光学长期以来推动了短波长产生的发展，但用于长波长的等效方法仍不成熟。在此，作者展示了一种基于芯片的铌酸锂平台，该平台可提供可调谐的中红外光，为传感、光谱学和通信开辟了新的可能性。

Structure.title: Film surface assemblies from chemically distinct block copolymer micelles
Structure.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65278-xBlock copolymer self-assembly enables complex nanostructures including spherical micelles, continuous cubic gyroids and Frank-Kasper phases. Here, the authors show how film surface self-assemblies of binary and ternary block copolymer micelle alloys pave a path to controlled multicomponent assemblies.
Structure.abstract: Block copolymer (BCP) self-assembly – neat, or in a homopolymer/second BCP containing molecular blend – enables complex nanostructures including spherical micelles, co-continuous cubic gyroids and Frank-Kasper phases. Emergent properties in metallic and high entropy alloys inspire a paradigm shift: treating chemically distinct BCP micelles as functional building blocks to pave a path for multicomponent assemblies with molecularly engineered property profiles. Slowing current progress are challenges associated with the structural characterization of such BCP assemblies with poor atomic contrast. Here, we demonstrate how film surface self-assemblies of binary and ternary BCP micelle alloys can be phase inverted to generate porosity. This, combined with machine-learning assisted image segmentation, allows component classification via routine scanning electron microscopy. Results are supported by mechanistic insights from Voronoi analysis, cluster analysis and Monte Carlo/Brownian Dynamics simulations, revealing rich and controllable non-equilibrium surface structural behavior. Such multicomponent materials are expected to enable emergent properties for a range of applications. Structure.title_cn: 由化学性质不同的嵌段共聚物胶束形成的薄膜表面组装体
Structure.abstract_cn: 嵌段共聚物（BCP）的自组装——无论是纯净的，还是在含有均聚物/第二种BCP的分子共混物中——都能够形成复杂的纳米结构，包括球形胶束、共连续立方回旋体和Frank-Kasper相。金属和高熵合金中涌现的特性启发了一种范式转变：将化学性质不同的BCP胶束视为功能性构建单元，为构建具有分子工程化性能特征的多组分组装体铺平道路。目前进展缓慢的原因是，这类原子对比度差的BCP组装体的结构表征面临挑战。在此，我们展示了二元和三元BCP胶束合金的薄膜表面自组装体如何通过相转化来产生孔隙。这与机器学习辅助的图像分割相结合，使得通过常规扫描电子显微镜进行组分分类成为可能。研究结果得到了来自Voronoi分析、聚类分析以及蒙特卡洛/布朗动力学模拟的机理洞察的支持，揭示了丰富且可控的非平衡表面结构行为。这类多组分材料有望为一系列应用带来涌现的特性。嵌段共聚物自组装能够形成复杂的纳米结构，包括球形胶束、连续立方回旋体和Frank-Kasper相。本文作者展示了二元和三元嵌段共聚物胶束合金的薄膜表面自组装体如何为受控的多组分组装体铺平道路。

Structure.title: Advancing sulfide solid electrolytes via green Li<sub>2</sub>S synthesis
Structure.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64924-8Sulfide solid electrolytes show potential for safer, higher-performance batteries, but costly Li2S precursors hinder commercial adoption. Here, authors develop a scalable, potentially eco-friendly Li2S synthesis method that reduces its production costs, which could facilitate wider deployment of sulfide solid electrolytes.
Structure.abstract: We present a potentially eco-friendly, cost-efficient strategy for synthesizing high-purity Li2S, a key precursor for sulfide-based solid electrolytes. While these electrolytes surpass conventional organic counterparts in both safety and performance, their widespread application is hindered by the high cost of Li2S. Here, a solvent-free metathesis route is developed, in which thiourea serves as an S2⁻ donor to sulfurize LiOH, enabling scalable Li2S production (∼100 g per batch) with significantly reduced projected costs. During the process, intermediates (H2NCN, H2O) are transformed into benign gases (CO2, NH3) that spontaneously leave the system, thereby driving Li2S formation without ΔGmix limitations. The as-synthesized Li2S is successfully applied to prepare sulfide-based solid electrolytes such as Li10GeP2S12 and argyrodite-Li5.5PS4.5Cl1.5, achieving laboratory-scale (1 kg) production costs reduction of up to 27.5% and 92.9%, respectively. Furthermore, all-solid-state batteries employing Li5.5PS4.5Cl1.5 demonstrate electrochemical performance comparable to those fabricate with commercial Li2S. This scalable methodology thus may provide a proming pathway to bridge low-cost Li2S synthesis with the practical deployment of sulfide-based solid electrolytes, which may accelerate the commercialization of high-performance all-solid-state batteries. Structure.title_cn: 通过绿色硫化锂合成技术推进硫化物固态电解质的发展
Structure.abstract_cn: 本研究提出了一种潜在环保且成本效益高的策略，旨在合成高纯度硫化锂（Li2S），该物质是硫化物基固态电解质的关键前体。尽管硫化物固态电解质在安全性和性能上均优于传统的有机电解质，但其广泛应用受到高成本Li2S的制约。在此，我们开发了一种无溶剂复分解路线，利用硫脲作为S2⁻供体对氢氧化锂（LiOH）进行硫化，从而实现了可规模化（每批次约100克）的Li2S生产，并显著降低了预计成本。在反应过程中，中间产物（H2NCN, H2O）转化为无害气体（CO2, NH3），这些气体自发逸出体系，从而在无ΔGmix限制的条件下驱动Li2S的形成。所合成的Li2S成功应用于制备硫化物基固态电解质，如Li10GeP2S12和硫银锗矿型Li5.5PS4.5Cl1.5，分别实现了实验室规模（1公斤）生产成本高达27.5%和92.9%的降低。此外，采用Li5.5PS4.5Cl1.5的全固态电池展现出与使用商业Li2S制备的电池相当的电化学性能。因此，这种可规模化的方法有望为低成本Li2S合成与硫化物基固态电解质的实际部署之间搭建桥梁，从而加速高性能全固态电池的商业化进程。硫化物固态电解质在实现更安全、更高性能电池方面具有巨大潜力，然而，昂贵的Li2S前体阻碍了其商业化进程。本研究开发了一种可规模化、潜在环保的Li2S合成方法，显著降低了其生产成本，有望促进硫化物固态电解质的更广泛应用。

Structure.title: Decoupling structural molecular dynamics from excited state lifetimes using few-femtosecond ultraviolet resonant dispersive waves
Structure.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64943-5Resonant dispersive wave (RDW) emission enables tunable few-femtosecond UV pulses which can be useful for ultrafast science. Here, the authors investigate ultrafast relaxation and structural evolution of morpholine with enhanced temporal resolution, following excitation via RDWs.
Structure.abstract: Optical sources exploiting resonant dispersive wave (RDW) emission are set to revolutionize ultrafast science. We demonstrate this approach by investigating excited state dynamics in morpholine using time-resolved photoelectron imaging. Excitation at 250 nm was achieved via RDW emission inside a helium-filled capillary fibre which, when combined with a short 800 nm probe, realized an instrument response of just 11 ± 2 fs. Two pathways initiate N–H bond fission: an extremely fast (<10 fs) process and a frustrated mechanism (380 fs) with hindered electronic ground state access. Photoelectron angular distributions also indicate average molecular geometry evolving on an intermediate (~100 fs) timescale. This clean distinction between population lifetimes and structural dynamics is enabled by the excellent temporal resolution inherent in RDW-based sources. Electronic structure and nonadiabatic surface hopping calculations support our data interpretation, and the synergy between experiment and theory is vital for developing a complete mechanistic picture. Resonant dispersive wave (RDW) emission enables tunable few-femtosecond UV pulses which can be useful for ultrafast science. Here, the authors investigate ultrafast relaxation and structural evolution of morpholine with enhanced temporal resolution, following excitation via RDWs.

Structure.title_cn: 利用飞秒级紫外共振色散波实现结构分子动力学与激发态寿命的解耦
Structure.abstract_cn: 利用共振色散波（RDW）发射的光源有望彻底改变超快科学。我们通过使用时间分辨光电子成像技术研究吗啉的激发态动力学来验证这一方法。通过在充氦毛细管光纤内利用RDW发射实现了250 nm的激发，当其与短脉冲800 nm探测光结合时，仪器响应时间仅为11 ± 2 fs。N–H键断裂由两条途径引发：一条是极快的（<10 fs）过程，另一条是受阻的（380 fs）机制，其电子基态的访问受到阻碍。光电子角分布也表明平均分子几何结构在中等（约100 fs）时间尺度上演化。RDW光源固有的出色时间分辨率使得群体寿命与结构动力学之间能够清晰区分。电子结构和非绝热表面跳跃计算支持我们的数据解释，实验与理论之间的协同作用对于建立完整的机理图景至关重要。共振色散波（RDW）发射能够产生可调谐的飞秒级紫外脉冲，对超快科学具有重要意义。本文作者利用RDW激发，以增强的时间分辨率研究了吗啉的超快弛豫和结构演化。

Structure.title: MISO: microfluidic protein isolation enables single-particle cryo-EM structure determination from a single cell colony
Structure.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02894-xThe micro isolation (MISO) method combines microfluidics-based protein purification with cryo-EM grid preparation, enabling cryo-EM structure determination of soluble and membrane proteins starting from less than 1 µg of a target protein.
Structure.abstract: Single-particle cryogenic electron microscopy (cryo-EM) enables reconstruction of atomic-resolution 3D maps of proteins by visualizing thousands to millions of purified protein particles embedded in vitreous ice. This corresponds to picograms of purified protein, which can potentially be isolated from a few thousand cells. Hence, cryo-EM holds the potential of a very sensitive analytical method for delivering high-resolution protein structure as a readout. In practice, millions of times more starting biological material is required to prepare cryo-EM grids. Here we show that using a micro isolation (MISO) method, which combines microfluidics-based protein purification with cryo-EM grid preparation, cryo-EM structures of soluble bacterial and eukaryotic membrane proteins can be solved starting from less than 1 µg of a target protein and progressing from cells to cryo-EM grids within a few hours. This scales down the amount of starting biological material hundreds to thousands of times, opening possibilities for the structural characterization of hitherto inaccessible proteins. The micro isolation (MISO) method combines microfluidics-based protein purification with cryo-EM grid preparation, enabling cryo-EM structure determination of soluble and membrane proteins starting from less than 1 µg of a target protein.

Structure.title_cn: MISO：微流控蛋白分离助力单细胞集落的单颗粒冷冻电镜结构测定
Structure.abstract_cn: 单颗粒冷冻电子显微镜（cryo-EM）通过观察包埋在玻璃态冰中的数千至数百万个纯化蛋白质颗粒，能够重建蛋白质的原子分辨率三维结构图。这相当于皮克级的纯化蛋白质，理论上可以从数千个细胞中分离得到。因此，cryo-EM 有潜力成为一种非常灵敏的分析方法，以高分辨率蛋白质结构作为输出。然而，在实际操作中，制备 cryo-EM 样品网格需要多达数百万倍的起始生物材料。本文展示了一种微分离（MISO）方法，该方法结合了基于微流控的蛋白质纯化与 cryo-EM 样品网格制备，能够从少于 1 微克的靶蛋白开始，并在数小时内从细胞到 cryo-EM 样品网格，解析可溶性细菌和真核膜蛋白的 cryo-EM 结构。这使得起始生物材料的用量减少了数百至数千倍，为迄今难以获得的蛋白质的结构表征开辟了可能性。微分离（MISO）方法结合了基于微流控的蛋白质纯化与 cryo-EM 样品网格制备，使得从少于 1 微克的靶蛋白开始即可进行可溶性蛋白和膜蛋白的 cryo-EM 结构测定。

Structure.title: Confocal Airy beam oblique light-sheet tomography for brain-wide cell type distribution and morphology
Structure.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02888-9Confocal Airy beam integrated with single-photon oblique light-sheet tomography (CAB-OLST) is a high-throughput imaging approach for brain-wide mapping of neurons, as demonstrated in cleared mouse brains.
Structure.abstract: Advanced brain-wide mapping is critical for addressing complex questions in neuroscience. However, current imaging methods are limited by throughput, resolution and signal-to-noise ratio, constraining their broader applicability. Here, we present confocal Airy beam integrated with single-photon oblique light-sheet tomography (CAB-OLST): a system that integrates single-photon excitation with a scanned Airy beam light sheet, virtual slit detection and automated mechanical sectioning. CAB-OLST enables high-throughput, high-resolution and high-signal-to-noise ratio volumetric imaging, achieving an optical resolution of 0.77 μm × 0.49 μm × 2.61 μm. This allows for mouse brain-wide cell type distribution mapping at a voxel size of 0.37 μm × 0.37 μm × 1.77 μm in 10 h and single-neuron projectome imaging with a voxel size of 0.26 μm × 0.26 μm × 1.06 μm over 58 h. Compared to existing light-sheet and point-scanning systems, CAB-OLST provides a scalable and robust platform for comprehensive neuronal morphology reconstruction and high-precision cell atlas generation. Confocal Airy beam integrated with single-photon oblique light-sheet tomography (CAB-OLST) is a high-throughput imaging approach for brain-wide mapping of neurons, as demonstrated in cleared mouse brains.

Structure.title_cn: 共聚焦艾里光束斜光片断层成像技术用于全脑细胞类型分布和形态学研究
Structure.abstract_cn: 先进的全脑图谱绘制对于解决神经科学中的复杂问题至关重要。然而，当前的成像方法在通量、分辨率和信噪比方面存在局限性，限制了其更广泛的应用。在此，我们提出了一种结合了共聚焦艾里光束和单光子斜光片断层成像技术（CAB-OLST）的系统：该系统集成了单光子激发、扫描艾里光束光片、虚拟狭缝检测和自动化机械切片。CAB-OLST 实现了高通量、高分辨率和高信噪比的体积成像，光学分辨率达到 0.77 μm × 0.49 μm × 2.61 μm。这使得在10小时内以0.37 μm × 0.37 μm × 1.77 μm的体素尺寸绘制小鼠全脑细胞类型分布图成为可能，并在58小时内以0.26 μm × 0.26 μm × 1.06 μm的体素尺寸进行单神经元投射组成像。与现有的光片和点扫描系统相比，CAB-OLST 为全面的神经元形态重建和高精度细胞图谱生成提供了一个可扩展且稳健的平台。共聚焦艾里光束结合单光子斜光片断层成像技术（CAB-OLST）是一种高通量成像方法，用于神经元的全脑图谱绘制，已在透明化小鼠大脑中得到验证。

Drug Discovery.title: A large-scale human toxicogenomics resource for drug-induced liver injury prediction
Drug Discovery.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65690-3Drug-induced liver injury is a major cause of patient harm, trial failures, and drug withdrawals. Here, the authors show that a toxicogenomics resource of 300 drugs enables the prediction of liver injury with 88% sensitivity at 100% specificity and reveals mechanisms for safer drug development.
Drug Discovery.abstract: Drug-Induced Liver Injury (DILI) remains one of the most critical challenges in drug development, causing patient safety concerns, clinical trial failures and drug withdrawals. We introduce ToxPredictor, a toxicogenomics framework combining RNA-seq data from primary human hepatocytes with pharmacokinetic data to predict dose-resolved DILI risks and safety margins. At its core is DILImap, an RNA-seq library tailored for DILI research, comprising 300 compounds at multiple concentrations. ToxPredictor achieves 88% sensitivity at 100% specificity in blind validation, outperforming state-of-the-art methods. It flagged recent phase III clinical failures, including Evobrutinib, TAK-875, and BMS-986142, overlooked by animal studies. Beyond prediction, ToxPredictor provides mechanistic insights into hepatotoxic pathways, enabling early de-risking and actionable safety decisions. Unlike single-endpoint readouts—even from 3D models—transcriptomics offers a multi-dimensional system-level view of hepatocyte responses, capable of detecting diverse DILI mechanisms not captured by conventional assays. Scalable, actionable, and integrated into a broader AI/ML drug discovery platform, this work establishes toxicogenomics as a promising tool for developing safer therapeutics and addressing one of the most pressing challenges in toxicology. Drug Discovery.title_cn: 一个用于药物性肝损伤预测的大规模人类毒理基因组学资源
Drug Discovery.abstract_cn: 药物性肝损伤（DILI）仍然是药物开发中最严峻的挑战之一，它导致患者安全问题、临床试验失败和药物撤市。我们引入了ToxPredictor，这是一个毒理基因组学框架，它结合了原代人肝细胞的RNA测序数据和药代动力学数据，以预测剂量依赖性的DILI风险和安全裕度。其核心是DILImap，一个为DILI研究量身定制的RNA测序文库，包含300种化合物在多个浓度下的数据。ToxPredictor在盲法验证中实现了88%的敏感性和100%的特异性，优于现有最先进的方法。它成功识别了近期被动物研究忽视的III期临床失败药物，包括Evobrutinib、TAK-875和BMS-986142。除了预测功能，ToxPredictor还提供了肝毒性通路的机制性见解，有助于早期去风险化和制定可操作的安全决策。与单终点读数（即使是来自3D模型）不同，转录组学提供了肝细胞反应的多维度系统级视图，能够检测传统检测方法无法捕获的多种DILI机制。这项工作具有可扩展性、可操作性，并已整合到一个更广泛的AI/ML药物发现平台中，它确立了毒理基因组学作为开发更安全疗法和解决毒理学中最紧迫挑战之一的有前景工具的地位。药物性肝损伤是导致患者伤害、试验失败和药物撤市的主要原因。本文作者展示了一个包含300种药物的毒理基因组学资源能够以88%的敏感性和100%的特异性预测肝损伤，并揭示了更安全药物开发的机制。

Drug Discovery.title: SynGFN: learning across chemical space with generative flow-based molecular discovery
Drug Discovery.summary: Nature Computational Science, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s43588-025-00902-wA persistent gap from theoretical molecules to experimentally viable compounds has hindered the practical adoption of generative algorithms. This study proposes SynGFN as a bridge linking molecular design and synthesis, accelerating exploration and producing diverse, synthesizable, high-performance molecules.
Drug Discovery.abstract: In recent years, artificial intelligence has advanced the design–make–test–analyze cycle, transforming molecular discovery. Despite these advances, the compartmentalized approach to computer-aided molecular design and synthesis remains a critical bottleneck, limiting further optimization of the design–make–test–analyze cycle. Here, to this end, we introduce SynGFN, which models molecular design as a cascade of simulated chemical reactions, enabling the assembly of molecules from synthesizable building blocks. SynGFN features two key ingredients: (1) a hierarchically pretrained policy network that accelerates learning across diverse distributions of desirable molecules in chemical spaces, and (2) a multifidelity acquisition framework to alleviate the cost of reward evaluations. These technical developments collectively endow SynGFN with the capability to explore a chemical space up to an order of magnitude larger (measured in terms of #Circles) than that of other synthesis-aware generative models, while identifying the most diverse, synthesizable and high-performance molecules. We demonstrate SynGFN’s potential impacts by designing inhibitors for GluN1/GluN3A, a therapeutic target for neuropsychiatric disorders. A persistent gap from theoretical molecules to experimentally viable compounds has hindered the practical adoption of generative algorithms. This study proposes SynGFN as a bridge linking molecular design and synthesis, accelerating exploration and producing diverse, synthesizable, high-performance molecules.

Drug Discovery.abstract_cn: 近年来，人工智能推动了“设计-合成-测试-分析”循环的发展，从而革新了分子发现领域。尽管取得了这些进展，但计算机辅助分子设计和合成的割裂方法仍然是一个关键瓶颈，限制了“设计-合成-测试-分析”循环的进一步优化。为此，我们引入了SynGFN，它将分子设计建模为一系列模拟化学反应，从而能够从可合成的构建块组装分子。SynGFN具有两个关键要素：(1) 一个分层预训练的策略网络，可加速在化学空间中多样化理想分子分布上的学习；(2) 一个多保真度采集框架，以减轻奖励评估的成本。这些技术发展共同赋予SynGFN探索比其他合成感知生成模型大一个数量级（以#Circles衡量）的化学空间的能力，同时识别出最多样化、可合成且高性能的分子。我们通过设计GluN1/GluN3A（一种神经精神疾病的治疗靶点）的抑制剂，展示了SynGFN的潜在影响。从理论分子到实验可行化合物之间长期存在的鸿沟阻碍了生成算法的实际应用。本研究提出SynGFN作为连接分子设计与合成的桥梁，加速了探索并生成了多样化、可合成且高性能的分子。

Drug Discovery.title: Uridine-sensitized screening identifies demethoxy-coenzyme Q and NUDT5 as regulators of nucleotide synthesis
Drug Discovery.summary: Nature Metabolism, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s42255-025-01419-2A uridine-sensitized CRISPR-Cas9 screening identifies demethoxy-CoQ as an alternative electron acceptor in the absence of CoQ, and NUDT5 as a regulator of de novo pyrimidine synthesis via its interaction with PPAT.
Drug Discovery.abstract: Rapidly proliferating cells require large amounts of nucleotides, making nucleotide metabolism a widely exploited therapeutic target against cancer, autoinflammatory disorders and viral infections. However, regulation of nucleotide metabolism remains incompletely understood. Here, we reveal regulators of de novo pyrimidine synthesis. Using uridine-sensitized CRISPR-Cas9 screening, we show that coenzyme Q (CoQ) is dispensable for pyrimidine synthesis, in the presence of the demethoxy-CoQ intermediate as alternative electron acceptor. We further report that the ADP-ribose pyrophosphatase NUDT5 directly binds PPAT, the rate-limiting enzyme in purine synthesis, which inhibits its activity and preserves the phosphoribosyl pyrophosphate (PRPP) pool. In the absence of NUDT5, hyperactive purine synthesis exhausts the PRPP pool at the expense of pyrimidine synthesis, which promotes resistance to purine and pyrimidine nucleobase analogues. Of note, the interaction between NUDT5 and PPAT is disrupted by PRPP, highlighting an intricate allosteric regulation. Overall, our findings reveal a fundamental mechanism of nucleotide balance and position NUDT5 as a regulator of nucleobase analogue metabolism. A uridine-sensitized CRISPR-Cas9 screening identifies demethoxy-CoQ as an alternative electron acceptor in the absence of CoQ, and NUDT5 as a regulator of de novo pyrimidine synthesis via its interaction with PPAT.

Drug Discovery.title_cn: 尿苷敏感性筛选鉴定出脱甲氧基辅酶Q和NUDT5为核苷酸合成的调控因子
Drug Discovery.abstract_cn: 快速增殖的细胞需要大量的核苷酸，这使得核苷酸代谢成为癌症、自身炎症性疾病和病毒感染的广泛利用的治疗靶点。然而，核苷酸代谢的调控机制仍未完全阐明。在此，我们揭示了从头嘧啶合成的调控因子。通过尿苷敏感性CRISPR-Cas9筛选，我们发现，在脱甲氧基辅酶Q中间体作为替代电子受体存在的情况下，辅酶Q (CoQ) 对于嘧啶合成并非必需。我们进一步报告，ADP-核糖焦磷酸酶NUDT5直接结合嘌呤合成的限速酶PPAT，从而抑制其活性并维持磷酸核糖焦磷酸 (PRPP) 库。在NUDT5缺失的情况下，过度活跃的嘌呤合成会耗尽PRPP库，从而牺牲嘧啶合成，并促进对嘌呤和嘧啶核碱基类似物的耐药性。值得注意的是，NUDT5和PPAT之间的相互作用被PRPP破坏，这突显了一种复杂的变构调控机制。总而言之，我们的研究结果揭示了核苷酸平衡的基本机制，并将NUDT5定位为核碱基类似物代谢的调控因子。尿苷敏感性CRISPR-Cas9筛选鉴定出脱甲氧基辅酶Q在CoQ缺失时作为替代电子受体，并揭示NUDT5通过与PPAT的相互作用调控从头嘧啶合成。

Drug Discovery.title: Chemical richness and diversity of uncultivated ‘Entotheonella’ symbionts in marine sponges
Drug Discovery.summary: Nature Chemical Biology, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41589-025-02066-0Marine sponges host bacteria that produce diverse bioactive compounds. Here, the authors conduct a large-scale metagenomic, single-bacterial and biochemical study to reveal the untapped biosynthetic potential of ‘Entotheonella’ symbionts, a talented producer taxon from microbial dark matter.
Drug Discovery.abstract: Marine sponges are the source of numerous bioactive natural products that serve as chemical defenses and provide pharmaceutical leads for drug development. For some of the compounds, symbiotic bacteria have been established as the actual producers. Among the known sponge symbionts, ‘Candidatus Entotheonella’ members stand out because of their abundant and variable biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs). Here, to obtain broader insights into this producer taxon, we conduct a comparative analysis on eight sponges through metagenomic and single-bacterial sequencing and biochemical studies. The data suggest sets of biosynthetic genes that are largely unique in 14 ‘Entotheonella’ candidate species and a member of a sister lineage named ‘Candidatus Proxinella’. Four biosynthetic loci were linked in silico or experimentally to cytotoxins, antibiotics and the terpene cembrene A from corals. The results support widespread and diverse bacterial roles in the chemistry of sponges and aid the development of sustainable production methods for sponge-derived therapeutics. Drug Discovery.title_cn: 海洋海绵中未培养的“Entotheonella”共生体的化学多样性与丰富性
Drug Discovery.abstract_cn: 海洋海绵是多种生物活性天然产物的来源，这些产物既可作为化学防御物质，也为药物开发提供了药学先导化合物。对于其中一些化合物，共生细菌已被证实是其真正的生产者。在已知的海绵共生体中，“Candidatus Entotheonella”成员因其丰富且多变的生物合成基因簇（BGCs）而脱颖而出。为了更深入地了解这一生产者类群，本研究通过宏基因组学、单细菌测序和生物化学研究，对八种海绵进行了比较分析。数据表明，在14种“Entotheonella”候选物种以及一个名为“Candidatus Proxinella”的姐妹谱系成员中，存在大量独特的生物合成基因集。四个生物合成位点通过计算机模拟或实验被证实与细胞毒素、抗生素以及来自珊瑚的萜烯类化合物cembrene A相关。这些结果支持了细菌在海绵化学中广泛而多样的作用，并有助于开发海绵源治疗药物的可持续生产方法。海洋海绵宿主细菌可产生多种生物活性化合物。本研究中，作者通过大规模宏基因组学、单细菌和生物化学研究，揭示了“Entotheonella”共生体（一个来自微生物暗物质的优秀生产者类群）尚未开发的生物合成潜力。

AI & Computational Biology.title: Convolutional architectures are cortex-aligned de novo
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature Machine Intelligence, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s42256-025-01142-3Kazemian et al. report that untrained convolutional networks with wide layers predict primate visual cortex responses nearly as well as task-optimized networks, revealing how architectural constraints shape brain-like representations in deep networks.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: What underlies the emergence of cortex-aligned representations in deep neural network models of vision? Earlier work suggested that shared architectural constraints were a major factor, but the success of widely varied architectures after pretraining raises critical questions about the importance of architectural constraints. Here we show that in wide networks with minimal training, architectural inductive biases have a prominent role. We examined networks with varied architectures but no pretraining and quantified their ability to predict image representations in the visual cortices of monkeys and humans. We found that cortex-aligned representations emerge in convolutional architectures that combine two key manipulations of dimensionality: compression in the spatial domain, through pooling, and expansion in the feature domain by increasing the number of channels. We further show that the inductive biases of convolutional architectures are critical for obtaining performance gains from feature expansion—dimensionality manipulations were relatively ineffective in other architectures and in convolutional models with targeted lesions. Our findings suggest that the architectural constraints of convolutional networks are sufficiently close to the constraints of biological vision to allow many aspects of cortical visual representation to emerge even before synaptic connections have been tuned through experience. Kazemian et al. report that untrained convolutional networks with wide layers predict primate visual cortex responses nearly as well as task-optimized networks, revealing how architectural constraints shape brain-like representations in deep networks.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 卷积架构的皮层对齐是其固有的
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 视觉深度神经网络模型中与皮层对齐的表征是如何产生的？此前研究表明，共享的架构约束是一个主要因素，但预训练后各种架构的成功引发了对架构约束重要性的质疑。本研究表明，在经过最少训练的宽网络中，架构归纳偏置发挥着重要作用。我们考察了具有不同架构但未经预训练的网络，并量化了它们预测猴子和人类视觉皮层图像表征的能力。我们发现，与皮层对齐的表征出现在卷积架构中，这些架构结合了维度操作的两个关键方面：通过池化在空间域进行压缩，以及通过增加通道数在特征域进行扩展。我们进一步表明，卷积架构的归纳偏置对于从特征扩展中获得性能提升至关重要——维度操作在其他架构以及经过靶向损伤的卷积模型中相对无效。我们的研究结果表明，卷积网络的架构约束与生物视觉的约束足够接近，使得皮层视觉表征的许多方面甚至在突触连接通过经验调整之前就能出现。Kazemian 等人报告称，未经训练的宽层卷积网络预测灵长类动物视觉皮层反应的能力几乎与任务优化的网络相当，揭示了架构约束如何在深度网络中塑造类脑表征。

AI & Computational Biology.title: SynGFN: learning across chemical space with generative flow-based molecular discovery
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature Computational Science, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s43588-025-00902-wA persistent gap from theoretical molecules to experimentally viable compounds has hindered the practical adoption of generative algorithms. This study proposes SynGFN as a bridge linking molecular design and synthesis, accelerating exploration and producing diverse, synthesizable, high-performance molecules.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: In recent years, artificial intelligence has advanced the design–make–test–analyze cycle, transforming molecular discovery. Despite these advances, the compartmentalized approach to computer-aided molecular design and synthesis remains a critical bottleneck, limiting further optimization of the design–make–test–analyze cycle. Here, to this end, we introduce SynGFN, which models molecular design as a cascade of simulated chemical reactions, enabling the assembly of molecules from synthesizable building blocks. SynGFN features two key ingredients: (1) a hierarchically pretrained policy network that accelerates learning across diverse distributions of desirable molecules in chemical spaces, and (2) a multifidelity acquisition framework to alleviate the cost of reward evaluations. These technical developments collectively endow SynGFN with the capability to explore a chemical space up to an order of magnitude larger (measured in terms of #Circles) than that of other synthesis-aware generative models, while identifying the most diverse, synthesizable and high-performance molecules. We demonstrate SynGFN’s potential impacts by designing inhibitors for GluN1/GluN3A, a therapeutic target for neuropsychiatric disorders. A persistent gap from theoretical molecules to experimentally viable compounds has hindered the practical adoption of generative algorithms. This study proposes SynGFN as a bridge linking molecular design and synthesis, accelerating exploration and producing diverse, synthesizable, high-performance molecules.

AI & Computational Biology.title: Jaxley: differentiable simulation enables large-scale training of detailed biophysical models of neural dynamics
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02895-wJaxley is a versatile platform for biophysical modeling in neuroscience. It allows efficiently simulating large-scale biophysical models on CPUs, GPUs and TPUs. Model parameters can be optimized with gradient descent via backpropagation of error.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Biophysical neuron models provide insights into cellular mechanisms underlying neural computations. A central challenge has been to identify parameters of detailed biophysical models such that they match physiological measurements or perform computational tasks. Here we describe a framework for simulating biophysical models in neuroscience—Jaxley—which addresses this challenge. By making use of automatic differentiation and GPU acceleration, Jaxley enables optimizing large-scale biophysical models with gradient descent. Jaxley can learn biophysical neuron models to match voltage or two-photon calcium recordings, sometimes orders of magnitude more efficiently than previous methods. Jaxley also makes it possible to train biophysical neuron models to perform computational tasks. We train a recurrent neural network to perform working memory tasks, and a network of morphologically detailed neurons with 100,000 parameters to solve a computer vision task. Jaxley improves the ability to build large-scale data- or task-constrained biophysical models, creating opportunities for investigating the mechanisms underlying neural computations across multiple scales. Jaxley is a versatile platform for biophysical modeling in neuroscience. It allows efficiently simulating large-scale biophysical models on CPUs, GPUs and TPUs. Model parameters can be optimized with gradient descent via backpropagation of error.

AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 生物物理神经元模型为神经计算背后的细胞机制提供了深入见解。一个核心挑战是确定详细生物物理模型的参数，使其与生理测量结果相符或执行计算任务。本文介绍了一个用于神经科学中生物物理模型模拟的框架——Jaxley，它解决了这一挑战。通过利用自动微分和GPU加速，Jaxley能够使用梯度下降法优化大规模生物物理模型。Jaxley可以学习生物物理神经元模型以匹配电压或双光子钙记录，其效率有时比现有方法高出几个数量级。Jaxley还使得训练生物物理神经元模型来执行计算任务成为可能。我们训练了一个循环神经网络来执行工作记忆任务，并训练了一个包含10万个参数的形态学详细神经元网络来解决计算机视觉任务。Jaxley提升了构建大规模数据或任务约束生物物理模型的能力，为研究跨多个尺度的神经计算机制创造了机会。Jaxley是一个用于神经科学中生物物理建模的多功能平台。它允许在CPU、GPU和TPU上高效模拟大规模生物物理模型。模型参数可以通过误差反向传播的梯度下降法进行优化。

AI & Computational Biology.title: OneProt: Towards multi-modal protein foundation models via latent space alignment of sequence, structure, binding sites and text encoders
AI & Computational Biology.summary: by Klemens Flöge, Srisruthi Udayakumar, Johanna Sommer, Marie Piraud, Stefan Kesselheim, Vincent Fortuin, Stephan Günnemann, Karel J. van der Weg, Holger Gohlke, Erinc Merdivan, Alina BazarovaRecent advances in Artificial Intelligence have enabled multi-modal systems to model and translate diverse information spaces. Extending beyond text and vision, we introduce OneProt, a multi-modal Deep Learning model for proteins that integrates structural, sequence, text, and binding site data. Using the ImageBind framework, OneProt aligns the latent spaces of protein modality encoders in a lightweight fine-tuning scheme that focuses on pairwise alignment with sequence data, rather than requiring full matches. This novel approach comprises a mix of Graph Neural Networks and transformer architectures. It demonstrates good performance in retrieval tasks and showcases the efficacy of multi-modal systems in Protein Machine Learning through a broad spectrum of downstream baselines, including enzyme function prediction and binding site analysis. Furthermore, OneProt enables the transfer of representational information from specialized encoders to the sequence encoder, enhancing capabilities for distinguishing evolutionarily related and unrelated sequences and exhibiting representational properties where evolutionarily related proteins align in similar directions within the latent space. In addition, we extensively investigate modality ablations to identify the encoders that contribute the most to predictive performance, highlighting the significance of the binding site encoder, which has not been used in similar models previously. This work expands the horizons of multi-modal protein models, paving the way for transformative applications in drug discovery, biocatalytic reaction planning, and protein engineering.

AI & Computational Biology.title: A large-scale human toxicogenomics resource for drug-induced liver injury prediction
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65690-3Drug-induced liver injury is a major cause of patient harm, trial failures, and drug withdrawals. Here, the authors show that a toxicogenomics resource of 300 drugs enables the prediction of liver injury with 88% sensitivity at 100% specificity and reveals mechanisms for safer drug development.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Drug-Induced Liver Injury (DILI) remains one of the most critical challenges in drug development, causing patient safety concerns, clinical trial failures and drug withdrawals. We introduce ToxPredictor, a toxicogenomics framework combining RNA-seq data from primary human hepatocytes with pharmacokinetic data to predict dose-resolved DILI risks and safety margins. At its core is DILImap, an RNA-seq library tailored for DILI research, comprising 300 compounds at multiple concentrations. ToxPredictor achieves 88% sensitivity at 100% specificity in blind validation, outperforming state-of-the-art methods. It flagged recent phase III clinical failures, including Evobrutinib, TAK-875, and BMS-986142, overlooked by animal studies. Beyond prediction, ToxPredictor provides mechanistic insights into hepatotoxic pathways, enabling early de-risking and actionable safety decisions. Unlike single-endpoint readouts—even from 3D models—transcriptomics offers a multi-dimensional system-level view of hepatocyte responses, capable of detecting diverse DILI mechanisms not captured by conventional assays. Scalable, actionable, and integrated into a broader AI/ML drug discovery platform, this work establishes toxicogenomics as a promising tool for developing safer therapeutics and addressing one of the most pressing challenges in toxicology. AI & Computational Biology.title: The topology of synergy: Linking topological and information-theoretic approaches to higher-order interactions in complex systems
AI & Computational Biology.summary: by Thomas F. Varley, Pedro A. M. Mediano, Alice Patania, Josh BongardThe study of irreducible higher-order interactions has become a core topic of study in complex systems, as they provide a formal scaffold around which to build a quantitative understanding of emergence and emergent properties. Furthermore, we find that dimensionality reduction techniques such as PCA preferentially represent higher-order redundancies, and largely fail to preserve both higher-order information and topological structure, suggesting that common manifold-based approaches to studying high-dimensional data are systematically failing to identify important features of the data. These results point towards the possibility of developing a rich theory of higher-order interactions that spans topological and information-theoretic approaches while simultaneously highlighting the profound limitations of more conventional methods.

AI & Computational Biology.title: SpaMWGDA: Identifying spatial domains of spatial transcriptomes using multi-view weighted fusion graph convolutional network and data augmentation
AI & Computational Biology.summary: by Lin Yuan, Boyuan Meng, Qingxiang Wang, Chunyu Hu, Cuihong Wang, De-Shuang HuangThe rapid development of spatial transcriptomics (ST) has made it possible to effectively integrate gene expression and spatial information of cells and accurately identify spatial domains. A large number of deep learning (DL)-based methods have been proposed to perform spatial domain identification and achieved impressive results. However, these methods have some limitations. First, these methods rely on a fixed similarity metric and cannot fully utilize neighborhood information. Second, they cannot efficiently and adaptively integrate key information when fusing and reconstructing gene expression using purely additive methods. Finally, these methods ignore key nonlinear features and introduce noise during clustering. To address these limitations, we propose a novel DL model SpaMWGDA based on multi-view weighted fused graph convolutional network (GCN) and data augmentation. By modeling spatial information using different similarity metrics, the model is able to successfully capture comprehensive neighborhood information of the spot features. By combining data augmentation and contrastive learning, SpaMWGDA is able to learn key gene expressions. SpaMWGDA uses a multi-view GCN encoder to model the similarities between spatial information and gene features, and uses a view-level attention mechanism for weighted fusion to adaptively learn the dependencies between them and learn the key features of each view. Experimental results not only demonstrate that SpaMWGDA outperforms competing methods in spatial domain identification and trajectory inference but also show the ability of SpaMWGDA to analyse tissue structure and function. The source code for SpaMWGDA is available at https://github.com/nathanyl/SpaMWGDA .

AI & Computational Biology.title: Improving the accuracy of automated labeling of specimen images datasets via a confidence-based process
AI & Computational Biology.summary: by Quentin Bateux, Jonathan Koss, Patrick W. Sweeney, Erika Edwards, Nelson Rios, Aaron M. DollarThe digitization of natural history collections over the past three decades has unlocked a treasure trove of specimen imagery and metadata. There is great interest in making this data more useful by further labeling it with additional trait data, and modern “deep learning” machine learning techniques utilizing convolutional neural nets (CNNs) and similar networks show particular promise to reduce the amount of required manual labeling by human experts, making the process much faster and less expensive. However, in most cases, the accuracy of these approaches is too low for reliable utilization of the automatic labeling, typically in the range of 80-85% accuracy. In this paper, we present and validate an approach that can greatly improve this accuracy, essentially by examining the “confidence” that the network has in the generated label as well as utilizing a user-defined threshold to reject labels that fall below a chosen level. We demonstrate that a naive model that produced 86% initial accuracy can achieve improved performance - over 95% accuracy (rejecting about 40% of the labels) or over 99% accuracy (rejecting about 65%) by selecting higher confidence thresholds. This gives flexibility to adapt existing models to the statistical requirements of various types of research and has the potential to move these automatic labeling approaches from being unusably inaccurate to being an invaluable new tool. After validating the approach in a number of ways, we annotate the reproductive state of a large dataset of over 600,000 herbarium specimens. The analysis of the results points at under-investigated correlations as well as general alignment with known trends. By sharing this new dataset alongside this work, we want to allow biologists to gather insights for their own research questions, at their chosen point of accuracy/coverage trade-off.

Biotechnology.title: Isotropic, aberration-corrected light sheet microscopy for rapid high-resolution imaging of cleared tissue
Biotechnology.summary: Nature Biotechnology, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41587-025-02882-8A light-sheet microscope built from off-the-shelf components enables high-resolution clear tissue imaging.
Biotechnology.abstract: Light-sheet microscopy is ideal for imaging large and cleared tissues, but achieving a high isotropic resolution for a centimeter-sized sample is limited by slow and often aberrated, axially scanned light sheets. Here, we introduce a compact, high-speed light-sheet fluorescence microscope achieving 850 nm isotropic resolution across cleared samples up to 1 cm³ and refractive indices ranging from 1.33 to 1.56. Using off-the-shelf optics, we combine an air objective and a meniscus lens with an axially swept light sheet to achieve diffraction-limited resolution and aberration correction. The effective field of view is increased by twofold by correcting the field curvature of the light sheet using a concave mirror in the remote focusing unit. Adapting the light sheet’s motion with a closed-loop feedback enhances the imaging speed by tenfold, reaching 100 frames per second while maintaining resolution and field of view. We benchmark the system performance across scales, from subcellular structure up to centimeter scale, using various clearing methods. A light-sheet microscope built from off-the-shelf components enables high-resolution clear tissue imaging.

Biotechnology.abstract: Drug-Induced Liver Injury (DILI) remains one of the most critical challenges in drug development, causing patient safety concerns, clinical trial failures and drug withdrawals. Unlike single-endpoint readouts—even from 3D models—transcriptomics offers a multi-dimensional system-level view of hepatocyte responses, capable of detecting diverse DILI mechanisms not captured by conventional assays. Scalable, actionable, and integrated into a broader AI/ML drug discovery platform, this work establishes toxicogenomics as a promising tool for developing safer therapeutics and addressing one of the most pressing challenges in toxicology. Biotechnology.summary: Nature Chemical Biology, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41589-025-02066-0Marine sponges host bacteria that produce diverse bioactive compounds. Here, the authors conduct a large-scale metagenomic, single-bacterial and biochemical study to reveal the untapped biosynthetic potential of ‘Entotheonella’ symbionts, a talented producer taxon from microbial dark matter.
Biotechnology.abstract: Marine sponges are the source of numerous bioactive natural products that serve as chemical defenses and provide pharmaceutical leads for drug development. For some of the compounds, symbiotic bacteria have been established as the actual producers. Among the known sponge symbionts, ‘Candidatus Entotheonella’ members stand out because of their abundant and variable biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs). Biotechnology.title: MISO: microfluidic protein isolation enables single-particle cryo-EM structure determination from a single cell colony

Biotechnology.abstract: Single-particle cryogenic electron microscopy (cryo-EM) enables reconstruction of atomic-resolution 3D maps of proteins by visualizing thousands to millions of purified protein particles embedded in vitreous ice. Biotechnology.title_cn: MISO：微流控蛋白分离助力单细胞集落的单颗粒冷冻电镜结构测定

Metabolism.title: Heat shock protein DNAJA2 controls insulin signaling and glucose homeostasis by preventing spontaneous insulin receptor endocytosis
Metabolism.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64948-0Insulin signaling pathway is critical for glucose homeostasis maintenance. Metabolism.title_cn: 热休克蛋白DNAJA2通过阻止自发性胰岛素受体内吞来调控胰岛素信号传导和葡萄糖稳态

Metabolism.title: Uridine-sensitized screening identifies demethoxy-coenzyme Q and NUDT5 as regulators of nucleotide synthesis

Metabolism.abstract: Rapidly proliferating cells require large amounts of nucleotides, making nucleotide metabolism a widely exploited therapeutic target against cancer, autoinflammatory disorders and viral infections. Overall, our findings reveal a fundamental mechanism of nucleotide balance and position NUDT5 as a regulator of nucleobase analogue metabolism. Metabolism.title_cn: 尿苷敏感性筛选鉴定出脱甲氧基辅酶Q和NUDT5为核苷酸合成的调控因子
Metabolism.abstract_cn: 快速增殖的细胞需要大量的核苷酸，这使得核苷酸代谢成为癌症、自身炎症性疾病和病毒感染的广泛利用的治疗靶点。然而，核苷酸代谢的调控机制仍未完全阐明。在此，我们揭示了从头嘧啶合成的调控因子。通过尿苷敏感性CRISPR-Cas9筛选，我们发现，在脱甲氧基辅酶Q中间体作为替代电子受体存在的情况下，辅酶Q (CoQ) 对于嘧啶合成并非必需。我们进一步报告，ADP-核糖焦磷酸酶NUDT5直接结合嘌呤合成的限速酶PPAT，从而抑制其活性并维持磷酸核糖焦磷酸 (PRPP) 库。在NUDT5缺失的情况下，过度活跃的嘌呤合成会耗尽PRPP库，从而牺牲嘧啶合成，并促进对嘌呤和嘧啶核碱基类似物的耐药性。值得注意的是，NUDT5和PPAT之间的相互作用被PRPP破坏，这突显了一种复杂的变构调控机制。总而言之，我们的研究结果揭示了核苷酸平衡的基本机制，并将NUDT5定位为核碱基类似物代谢的调控因子。尿苷敏感性CRISPR-Cas9筛选鉴定出脱甲氧基辅酶Q在CoQ缺失时作为替代电子受体，并揭示NUDT5通过与PPAT的相互作用调控从头嘧啶合成。

Development.title: Developmentally regulated genes drive phylogenomic splits in ovule evolution
Development.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65399-3Making use of phylogenomic and transcriptome analysis of 20 plant species, including 14 gymnosperms, Sondervan et al. uncover candidate ovule genes and find that orthologs with differential tissue expression patterns across species most influence major evolutionary splits of seed plants.
Development.abstract: The evolution of seeds transformed life on earth and is responsible for our most important food crops. Gymnosperms, the oldest living seed plants, are an untapped genomic reservoir for genes involved in seed evolution. To tap this resource, we assemble deep transcriptomes of 14 gymnosperms, four angiosperms, and two ferns and identified 22,429 phylogenetically informative ortholog groups. We observe that genes differentially expressed in ovules or leaves provide the majority of phylogenomic support for the evolutionary splits between 1) seed and non-seed plants; 2) gymnosperms and angiosperms; and/or 3) within gymnosperms (conifers vs. “ancient” gymnosperms). Our gymnosperm data identifies unreported candidate ovule regulated genes in Arabidopsis. Moreover, prior knowledge from Arabidopsis helps uncover 4,076 candidate ovule genes that influence these evolutionary splits. We validate the expression of candidate ovule genes in gymnosperm-specific ovule structures. Our work provides a resource for seed gene discovery, conservation, and crop improvement. Development.title: Mitotic entry is controlled by the plant-specific phosphatase BSL1 and cyclin-dependent kinase B
Development.summary: Nature Plants, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41477-025-02145-zThe mechanism controlling mitosis is not understood in plants. Tulin et al. show that mitosis is prevented by CDKB phosphorylation and promoted by BSL1-mediated dephosphorylation, revealing the mechanism of mitotic control in the plant kingdom.
Development.abstract: Cell cycle regulation is well understood in opisthokonts (fungi and metazoans) but not in plants or Apicomplexa, as some cell cycle regulators are not conserved. In opisthokonts, cell cycle progression requires the dephosphorylation of cyclin-dependent kinase (CDK) by the CDC25 phosphatase. Plants have no CDC25, and thus their mechanisms of cell cycle regulation remain elusive. Here we show that the BSL1 phosphatase dephosphorylates CDKB1 to promote mitotic entry in Chlamydomonas. Alterations of BSL1 or CDKB1 block mitotic entry after DNA replication. BSL1 shows dynamic localization through the cell cycle at the basal bodies, spindle poles and cleavage furrow. CDKB1 is hyperphosphorylated at the Thr14 and Tyr15 residues in the bsl1 mutant and in wild-type cells treated with DNA replication inhibitors. BSL1 binds to CDKB1 and dephosphorylates CDKB1 pThr14/pTyr15 in vitro. Phospho-mimicking alterations of Thr14/Tyr15 inactivate CDKB1 function, whereas phospho-blocking alterations cause sensitivity to DNA replication inhibitors, which delay cytokinesis in wild-type cells more than in cells expressing unphosphorylatable mutant CDKB1. These results indicate that CDKB1 Thr14 and Tyr15 are phosphorylated to block mitotic entry before DNA replication is complete, and BSL1 dephosphorylates CDKB1 to promote mitosis. Our study demonstrates that BSL1, a phosphatase conserved in plants and Apicomplexa but absent in fungi and animals, is a CDKB1-activating mitosis-promoting factor that has evolved additional signalling functions in receptor kinase pathways in higher plants. The mechanism controlling mitosis is not understood in plants. Tulin et al. show that mitosis is prevented by CDKB phosphorylation and promoted by BSL1-mediated dephosphorylation, revealing the mechanism of mitotic control in the plant kingdom.

Development.title_cn: 植物特异性磷酸酶BSL1和细胞周期蛋白依赖性激酶B调控有丝分裂起始
Development.abstract_cn: 细胞周期调控在后生生物（如真菌和动物）中已得到充分理解，但在植物或顶复门生物中则不然，因为一些细胞周期调节因子并不保守。在后生生物中，细胞周期进程需要CDC25磷酸酶对细胞周期蛋白依赖性激酶（CDK）进行去磷酸化。植物不含CDC25，因此其细胞周期调控机制仍不清楚。本研究表明，BSL1磷酸酶通过使CDKB1去磷酸化来促进莱茵衣藻的有丝分裂起始。BSL1或CDKB1的改变会在DNA复制后阻断有丝分裂起始。BSL1在细胞周期中表现出动态定位，存在于基体、纺锤体极和细胞分裂沟。在bsl1突变体和经DNA复制抑制剂处理的野生型细胞中，CDKB1在Thr14和Tyr15残基处发生过度磷酸化。BSL1与CDKB1结合，并在体外使CDKB1的pThr14/pTyr15去磷酸化。Thr14/Tyr15的磷酸化模拟突变会使CDKB1功能失活，而磷酸化阻断突变则导致对DNA复制抑制剂的敏感性，与表达不可磷酸化突变CDKB1的细胞相比，这些抑制剂在野生型细胞中更能延迟细胞分裂。这些结果表明，CDKB1的Thr14和Tyr15在DNA复制完成前被磷酸化以阻断有丝分裂起始，而BSL1通过使CDKB1去磷酸化来促进有丝分裂。我们的研究表明，BSL1是一种在植物和顶复门生物中保守但在真菌和动物中缺失的磷酸酶，它是一种激活CDKB1的有丝分裂促进因子，并且在高等植物的受体激酶通路中演化出了额外的信号功能。植物中有丝分裂的调控机制尚不清楚。Tulin等人揭示了CDKB磷酸化阻止有丝分裂，而BSL1介导的去磷酸化促进有丝分裂的机制，从而阐明了植物界有丝分裂的调控机制。

Evolution.title_cn: 发育调控基因驱动胚珠进化中的系统基因组学分化
Evolution.abstract_cn: 种子的进化改变了地球上的生命，并催生了我们最重要的粮食作物。裸子植物作为现存最古老的种子植物，是种子进化相关基因尚未开发的基因组宝库。为了利用这一资源，我们组装了14种裸子植物、4种被子植物和2种蕨类植物的深度转录组，并鉴定了22,429个具有系统发育信息价值的直系同源基因组。我们发现，在胚珠或叶片中差异表达的基因，为以下进化分化提供了主要的系统基因组学支持：1) 种子植物与非种子植物之间；2) 裸子植物与被子植物之间；和/或 3) 裸子植物内部（针叶树与“古老”裸子植物之间）。我们的裸子植物数据在拟南芥中识别出未曾报道的胚珠调控候选基因。此外，来自拟南芥的现有知识有助于揭示4,076个影响这些进化分化的胚珠候选基因。我们验证了候选胚珠基因在裸子植物特有胚珠结构中的表达。我们的工作为种子基因的发现、保护和作物改良提供了资源。Sondervan等人利用对包括14种裸子植物在内的20种植物物种进行的系统基因组学和转录组分析，揭示了胚珠候选基因，并发现跨物种具有差异组织表达模式的直系同源基因对种子植物的主要进化分化影响最大。

Neuroscience.title: Convolutional architectures are cortex-aligned de novo
Neuroscience.summary: Nature Machine Intelligence, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s42256-025-01142-3Kazemian et al. report that untrained convolutional networks with wide layers predict primate visual cortex responses nearly as well as task-optimized networks, revealing how architectural constraints shape brain-like representations in deep networks.
Neuroscience.abstract: What underlies the emergence of cortex-aligned representations in deep neural network models of vision? Earlier work suggested that shared architectural constraints were a major factor, but the success of widely varied architectures after pretraining raises critical questions about the importance of architectural constraints. Here we show that in wide networks with minimal training, architectural inductive biases have a prominent role. We examined networks with varied architectures but no pretraining and quantified their ability to predict image representations in the visual cortices of monkeys and humans. We found that cortex-aligned representations emerge in convolutional architectures that combine two key manipulations of dimensionality: compression in the spatial domain, through pooling, and expansion in the feature domain by increasing the number of channels. We further show that the inductive biases of convolutional architectures are critical for obtaining performance gains from feature expansion—dimensionality manipulations were relatively ineffective in other architectures and in convolutional models with targeted lesions. Our findings suggest that the architectural constraints of convolutional networks are sufficiently close to the constraints of biological vision to allow many aspects of cortical visual representation to emerge even before synaptic connections have been tuned through experience. Kazemian et al. report that untrained convolutional networks with wide layers predict primate visual cortex responses nearly as well as task-optimized networks, revealing how architectural constraints shape brain-like representations in deep networks.

Neuroscience.title_cn: 卷积架构的皮层对齐是其固有的
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 视觉深度神经网络模型中与皮层对齐的表征是如何产生的？此前研究表明，共享的架构约束是一个主要因素，但预训练后各种架构的成功引发了对架构约束重要性的质疑。本研究表明，在经过最少训练的宽网络中，架构归纳偏置发挥着重要作用。我们考察了具有不同架构但未经预训练的网络，并量化了它们预测猴子和人类视觉皮层图像表征的能力。我们发现，与皮层对齐的表征出现在卷积架构中，这些架构结合了维度操作的两个关键方面：通过池化在空间域进行压缩，以及通过增加通道数在特征域进行扩展。我们进一步表明，卷积架构的归纳偏置对于从特征扩展中获得性能提升至关重要——维度操作在其他架构以及经过靶向损伤的卷积模型中相对无效。我们的研究结果表明，卷积网络的架构约束与生物视觉的约束足够接近，使得皮层视觉表征的许多方面甚至在突触连接通过经验调整之前就能出现。Kazemian 等人报告称，未经训练的宽层卷积网络预测灵长类动物视觉皮层反应的能力几乎与任务优化的网络相当，揭示了架构约束如何在深度网络中塑造类脑表征。

Neuroscience.title: Solving sparse finite element problems on neuromorphic hardware
Neuroscience.summary: Nature Machine Intelligence, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s42256-025-01143-2Theilman and Aimone introduce a natively spiking algorithm for solving partial differential equations on large-scale neuromorphic computers and demonstrate the algorithm on Intel’s Loihi 2 neuromorphic research chip.
Neuroscience.abstract: The finite element method (FEM) is one of the most important and ubiquitous numerical methods for solving partial differential equations (PDEs) on computers for scientific and engineering discovery. Applying the FEM to larger and more detailed scientific models has driven advances in high-performance computing for decades. Here we demonstrate that scalable spiking neuromorphic hardware can directly implement the FEM by constructing a spiking neural network that solves the large, sparse, linear systems of equations at the core of the FEM. We show that for the Poisson equation, a fundamental PDE in science and engineering, our neural circuit achieves meaningful levels of numerical accuracy and close to ideal scaling on modern, inherently parallel and energy-efficient neuromorphic hardware, specifically Intel’s Loihi 2 neuromorphic platform. We illustrate extensions to irregular mesh geometries in both two and three dimensions as well as other PDEs such as linear elasticity. Our spiking neural network is constructed from a recurrent network model of the brain’s motor cortex and, in contrast to black-box deep artificial neural network-based methods for PDEs, directly translates the well-understood and trusted mathematics of the FEM to a natively spiking neuromorphic algorithm. Theilman and Aimone introduce a natively spiking algorithm for solving partial differential equations on large-scale neuromorphic computers and demonstrate the algorithm on Intel’s Loihi 2 neuromorphic research chip.
Neuroscience.authors_short: Theilman, Bradley H. & Aimone, James B.
Neuroscience.title_cn: 在神经拟态硬件上求解稀疏有限元问题
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 有限元方法 (FEM) 是科学和工程探索中，用于在计算机上求解偏微分方程 (PDE) 的最重要和最普遍的数值方法之一。几十年来，将有限元方法应用于更大、更详细的科学模型，推动了高性能计算的发展。本文证明，可扩展的脉冲神经拟态硬件可以通过构建一个脉冲神经网络来直接实现有限元方法，该网络能够求解有限元方法核心的大型稀疏线性方程组。我们展示了，对于科学和工程中的基本偏微分方程——泊松方程，我们的神经电路在现代、固有的并行且节能的神经拟态硬件（特别是英特尔的Loihi 2神经拟态平台）上，实现了有意义的数值精度和接近理想的扩展性。我们还展示了其在二维和三维不规则网格几何以及其他偏微分方程（如线性弹性）中的扩展应用。我们的脉冲神经网络是基于大脑运动皮层的循环网络模型构建的，与基于黑盒深度人工神经网络的偏微分方程求解方法不同，它将有限元方法成熟且可靠的数学原理直接转化为一种原生的脉冲神经拟态算法。Theilman和Aimone介绍了一种用于在大规模神经拟态计算机上求解偏微分方程的原生脉冲算法，并在英特尔的Loihi 2神经拟态研究芯片上进行了演示。

Neuroscience.title_cn: 发病年龄视角下的抑郁症遗传学
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 一项利用来自五个北欧国家的生物样本库和登记数据进行的研究揭示，早发型和晚发型重度抑郁症具有独特的遗传关联，并且在遗传结构以及与其他性状的关系上存在差异。根据发病年龄进行分层，有助于揭示与严重结局相关的风险效应，并为制定预防策略提供依据。

Neuroscience.title: Differentiable simulation expands frontiers for biophysical neural models
Neuroscience.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02933-7JAXLEY, a differentiable simulator, leverages automatic differentiation and GPU acceleration to make large-scale biophysical neuron model optimization feasible. This approach uniquely combines biological accuracy with advanced machine-learning optimization techniques, allowing for efficient hyperparameter tuning and the exploration of neural computation mechanisms at scale.

Neuroscience.title_cn: 可微分模拟拓展了生物物理神经模型的研究前沿
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: JAXLEY，一个可微分模拟器，利用自动微分和GPU加速，使大规模生物物理神经模型的优化成为可能。这种方法独特地将生物学精度与先进的机器学习优化技术相结合，从而实现高效的超参数调优以及大规模神经计算机制的探索。

Neuroscience.title: Jaxley: differentiable simulation enables large-scale training of detailed biophysical models of neural dynamics
Neuroscience.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02895-wJaxley is a versatile platform for biophysical modeling in neuroscience. It allows efficiently simulating large-scale biophysical models on CPUs, GPUs and TPUs. Model parameters can be optimized with gradient descent via backpropagation of error.
Neuroscience.abstract: Biophysical neuron models provide insights into cellular mechanisms underlying neural computations. A central challenge has been to identify parameters of detailed biophysical models such that they match physiological measurements or perform computational tasks. Here we describe a framework for simulating biophysical models in neuroscience—Jaxley—which addresses this challenge. By making use of automatic differentiation and GPU acceleration, Jaxley enables optimizing large-scale biophysical models with gradient descent. Jaxley can learn biophysical neuron models to match voltage or two-photon calcium recordings, sometimes orders of magnitude more efficiently than previous methods. Jaxley also makes it possible to train biophysical neuron models to perform computational tasks. We train a recurrent neural network to perform working memory tasks, and a network of morphologically detailed neurons with 100,000 parameters to solve a computer vision task. Jaxley improves the ability to build large-scale data- or task-constrained biophysical models, creating opportunities for investigating the mechanisms underlying neural computations across multiple scales. Jaxley is a versatile platform for biophysical modeling in neuroscience. It allows efficiently simulating large-scale biophysical models on CPUs, GPUs and TPUs. Model parameters can be optimized with gradient descent via backpropagation of error.

Neuroscience.title_cn: Jaxley：可微分模拟赋能神经动力学详细生物物理模型的大规模训练
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 生物物理神经元模型为神经计算背后的细胞机制提供了深入见解。一个核心挑战是确定详细生物物理模型的参数，使其与生理测量结果相符或执行计算任务。本文介绍了一个用于神经科学中生物物理模型模拟的框架——Jaxley，它解决了这一挑战。通过利用自动微分和GPU加速，Jaxley能够使用梯度下降法优化大规模生物物理模型。Jaxley可以学习生物物理神经元模型以匹配电压或双光子钙记录，其效率有时比现有方法高出几个数量级。Jaxley还使得训练生物物理神经元模型来执行计算任务成为可能。我们训练了一个循环神经网络来执行工作记忆任务，并训练了一个包含10万个参数的形态学详细神经元网络来解决计算机视觉任务。Jaxley提升了构建大规模数据或任务约束生物物理模型的能力，为研究跨多个尺度的神经计算机制创造了机会。Jaxley是一个用于神经科学中生物物理建模的多功能平台。它允许在CPU、GPU和TPU上高效模拟大规模生物物理模型。模型参数可以通过误差反向传播的梯度下降法进行优化。

Neuroscience.title: Stimulus-modulated approach to steady state (SASS): a flexible paradigm for event-related fMRI
Neuroscience.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02902-0Stimulus-modulated approach to steady state (SASS) is an acquisition scheme for event-related fMRI that generates data with high temporal signal-to-noise ratios interspaced with acquisition-free periods for stimulus presentation or response recording. It is demonstrated in auditory and visual stimulation paradigms in marmosets at 9.4 T and in human participants at 3 T.
Neuroscience.abstract: Functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI) studies discard the initial volumes acquired during the approach of the magnetization to its steady-state value. Here we leverage the higher temporal signal-to-noise ratio of these initial volumes to increase the sensitivity of event-related fMRI experiments. We introduce acquisition-free periods (AFPs) that permit the full recovery of the magnetization, followed by an acquisition block of fMRI volumes. An appropriately placed stimulus in the AFP produces a blood oxygenation level-dependent response that peaks during the initial high temporal signal-to-noise ratio phase of the acquisition block. Using humans and monkeys (Callithrix jacchus) at different field strengths, we demonstrate up to a ~50% reduction in the number of trials needed to achieve a given statistical threshold relative to conventional fMRI. The silent AFP can be exploited for the presentation of auditory stimuli or uncontaminated electrophysiological recording and its variable duration allows aperiodic stimulus or response-locked signal averaging as well as gating to physiology or motion. Stimulus-modulated approach to steady state (SASS) is an acquisition scheme for event-related fMRI that generates data with high temporal signal-to-noise ratios interspaced with acquisition-free periods for stimulus presentation or response recording. It is demonstrated in auditory and visual stimulation paradigms in marmosets at 9.4 T and in human participants at 3 T.

Neuroscience.title_cn: 刺激调制稳态逼近法 (SASS)：一种用于事件相关功能磁共振成像的灵活范式
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 功能磁共振成像 (fMRI) 研究通常会丢弃磁化强度达到稳态过程中采集的初始体数据。本研究利用这些初始体数据较高的时间信噪比，以提高事件相关fMRI实验的灵敏度。我们引入了无采集期 (AFPs)，该时期允许磁化强度完全恢复，随后是一个fMRI体数据的采集块。在无采集期内适当放置的刺激会产生血氧水平依赖性 (BOLD) 反应，该反应在采集块初始高时间信噪比阶段达到峰值。通过在不同场强下对人类和狨猴 (Callithrix jacchus) 进行研究，我们证明与传统fMRI相比，达到给定统计阈值所需的试验次数可减少约50%。静默的无采集期可用于呈现听觉刺激或进行无干扰的电生理记录，其可变持续时间允许非周期性刺激或响应锁定信号平均，以及生理或运动门控。刺激调制稳态逼近法 (SASS) 是一种事件相关fMRI采集方案，它生成具有高时间信噪比的数据，并穿插无采集期用于刺激呈现或响应记录。该方法已在9.4 T场强下的狨猴听觉和视觉刺激范式以及3 T场强下的人类受试者中得到验证。

Neuroscience.title: Confocal Airy beam oblique light-sheet tomography for brain-wide cell type distribution and morphology
Neuroscience.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02888-9Confocal Airy beam integrated with single-photon oblique light-sheet tomography (CAB-OLST) is a high-throughput imaging approach for brain-wide mapping of neurons, as demonstrated in cleared mouse brains.
Neuroscience.abstract: Advanced brain-wide mapping is critical for addressing complex questions in neuroscience. However, current imaging methods are limited by throughput, resolution and signal-to-noise ratio, constraining their broader applicability. Here, we present confocal Airy beam integrated with single-photon oblique light-sheet tomography (CAB-OLST): a system that integrates single-photon excitation with a scanned Airy beam light sheet, virtual slit detection and automated mechanical sectioning. CAB-OLST enables high-throughput, high-resolution and high-signal-to-noise ratio volumetric imaging, achieving an optical resolution of 0.77 μm × 0.49 μm × 2.61 μm. This allows for mouse brain-wide cell type distribution mapping at a voxel size of 0.37 μm × 0.37 μm × 1.77 μm in 10 h and single-neuron projectome imaging with a voxel size of 0.26 μm × 0.26 μm × 1.06 μm over 58 h. Compared to existing light-sheet and point-scanning systems, CAB-OLST provides a scalable and robust platform for comprehensive neuronal morphology reconstruction and high-precision cell atlas generation. Confocal Airy beam integrated with single-photon oblique light-sheet tomography (CAB-OLST) is a high-throughput imaging approach for brain-wide mapping of neurons, as demonstrated in cleared mouse brains.
Neuroscience.authors_short: Qi, Xiaoli et al., Osten, Pavel
Neuroscience.title_cn: 共聚焦艾里光束斜光片断层成像技术用于全脑细胞类型分布和形态学研究
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 先进的全脑图谱绘制对于解决神经科学中的复杂问题至关重要。然而，当前的成像方法在通量、分辨率和信噪比方面存在局限性，限制了其更广泛的应用。在此，我们提出了一种结合了共聚焦艾里光束和单光子斜光片断层成像技术（CAB-OLST）的系统：该系统集成了单光子激发、扫描艾里光束光片、虚拟狭缝检测和自动化机械切片。CAB-OLST 实现了高通量、高分辨率和高信噪比的体积成像，光学分辨率达到 0.77 μm × 0.49 μm × 2.61 μm。这使得在10小时内以0.37 μm × 0.37 μm × 1.77 μm的体素尺寸绘制小鼠全脑细胞类型分布图成为可能，并在58小时内以0.26 μm × 0.26 μm × 1.06 μm的体素尺寸进行单神经元投射组成像。与现有的光片和点扫描系统相比，CAB-OLST 为全面的神经元形态重建和高精度细胞图谱生成提供了一个可扩展且稳健的平台。共聚焦艾里光束结合单光子斜光片断层成像技术（CAB-OLST）是一种高通量成像方法，用于神经元的全脑图谱绘制，已在透明化小鼠大脑中得到验证。

Neuroscience.title: Library size-stabilized metacells construction enhances co-expression network analysis in single-cell data
Neuroscience.summary: by Tianjiao Zhang, Haibin ZhuSingle-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) deciphers cell type-specific co-expression networks to resolve biological functions but remains constrained by data sparsity and compositional biases. Conventional metacells construction strategies mitigate sparsity by aggregating transcriptionally similar cells but often neglect systematic biases introduced by compositional data. This problem leads to spurious co-expression correlations and obscuring biologically meaningful interactions. Through mathematical modeling and simulations, we demonstrate that uncontrolled library size variance in traditional metacells inflates false-positive correlations and distorts co-expression networks. Here, we present LSMetacell (Library Size-stabilized Metacells), a computational framework that explicitly stabilizes library sizes across metacells to reduce compositional noise while preserving cellular heterogeneity. LSMetacell addresses this by stabilizing library sizes during metacells aggregation, thereby enhancing the accuracy of downstream analyses such as Weighted Gene Co-expression Network Analysis (WGCNA). Applied to a postmortem Alzheimer’s disease brain scRNA-seq dataset, LSMetacell revealed robust, cell type-specific co-expression modules enriched for disease-relevant pathways, outperforming the conventional metacells approach. Our work establishes a principled strategy for resolving compositional biases in scRNA-seq data, advancing the reliability of co-expression network inference in studying complex biological systems. This framework provides a generalizable solution for improving transcriptional analyses in single-cell studies.

Neuroscience.title_cn: 文库大小稳定化的元细胞构建增强单细胞数据中的共表达网络分析
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 单细胞RNA测序（scRNA-seq）能够解析细胞类型特异性共表达网络以阐明生物学功能，但仍受数据稀疏性和组成偏差的限制。传统的元细胞构建策略通过聚合转录相似的细胞来缓解稀疏性，但通常忽略了由组成型数据引入的系统性偏差。这个问题导致虚假的共表达相关性，并掩盖了具有生物学意义的相互作用。通过数学建模和模拟，我们证明了传统元细胞中不受控制的文库大小变异会增加假阳性相关性并扭曲共表达网络。在此，我们提出了LSMetacell（文库大小稳定化元细胞），这是一个计算框架，它明确地稳定了元细胞间的文库大小，以减少组成噪声，同时保留了细胞异质性。LSMetacell通过在元细胞聚合过程中稳定文库大小来解决这个问题，从而提高了下游分析（如加权基因共表达网络分析（WGCNA））的准确性。将LSMetacell应用于一份死后阿尔茨海默病脑部scRNA-seq数据集，它揭示了稳健的、细胞类型特异性的共表达模块，这些模块富集了与疾病相关的通路，并且优于传统的元细胞方法。我们的工作建立了一种解决scRNA-seq数据中组成偏差的原则性策略，提高了在研究复杂生物系统中共表达网络推断的可靠性。该框架为改进单细胞研究中的转录分析提供了一个通用解决方案。

Neuroscience.title: Stimulus-to-stimulus learning in RNNs with cortical inductive biases
Neuroscience.summary: by Pantelis Vafidis, Antonio RangelAnimals learn to predict external contingencies from experience through a process of conditioning. A natural mechanism for conditioning is stimulus substitution, whereby the neuronal response to the CS becomes increasingly identical to that of the US. We propose a recurrent neural network model of stimulus substitution which leverages two forms of inductive bias pervasive in the cortex: representational inductive bias in the form of mixed stimulus representations, and architectural inductive bias in the form of two-compartment pyramidal neurons that have been shown to serve as a fundamental unit of cortical associative learning. The properties of these neurons allow for a biologically plausible learning rule that implements stimulus substitution, utilizing only information available locally at the synapses. We show that the model generates a wide array of conditioning phenomena, and can learn large numbers of associations with an amount of training commensurate with animal experiments, without relying on parameter fine-tuning for each individual experimental task. In contrast, we show that commonly used Hebbian rules fail to learn generic stimulus-stimulus associations with mixed selectivity, and require task-specific parameter fine-tuning. Our framework highlights the importance of multi-compartment neuronal processing in the cortex, and showcases how it might confer cortical animals the evolutionary edge.

Neuroscience.title_cn: 具有皮层归纳偏置的循环神经网络中的刺激关联学习
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 动物通过条件反射过程，从经验中学习预测外部偶发事件。条件反射的一种自然机制是刺激替代，即条件刺激（CS）引起的神经元反应与非条件刺激（US）的反应变得越来越相似。我们提出了一种刺激替代的循环神经网络模型，该模型利用了皮层中普遍存在的两种归纳偏置：以混合刺激表征形式存在的表征归纳偏置，以及以双区锥体神经元形式存在的架构归纳偏置。这些双区锥体神经元已被证明是皮层联想学习的基本单元。这些神经元的特性使得一种生物学上合理的学习规则得以实现，该规则执行刺激替代，并且仅利用突触局部可用的信息。我们展示了该模型能够生成多种条件反射现象，并且能够学习大量关联，其训练量与动物实验相当，而无需针对每个单独的实验任务进行参数微调。相比之下，我们发现常用的赫布规则（Hebbian rules）无法学习具有混合选择性的通用刺激-刺激关联，并且需要针对特定任务进行参数微调。我们的框架强调了皮层中多区神经元处理的重要性，并展示了它如何赋予皮层动物进化优势。

Neuroscience.title: The topology of synergy: Linking topological and information-theoretic approaches to higher-order interactions in complex systems
Neuroscience.summary: by Thomas F. Varley, Pedro A. M. Mediano, Alice Patania, Josh BongardThe study of irreducible higher-order interactions has become a core topic of study in complex systems, as they provide a formal scaffold around which to build a quantitative understanding of emergence and emergent properties. Two of the most well-developed frameworks, topological data analysis and multivariate information theory, aim to provide formal tools for identifying higher-order interactions in empirical data. Despite similar aims, however, these two approaches are built on markedly different mathematical foundations and have been developed largely in parallel - with limited interdisciplinary cross-talk between them. In this study, we present a head-to-head comparison of topological data analysis and information-theoretic approaches to describing higher-order interactions in multivariate data; with the goal of assessing the similarities, and differences, between how the frameworks define “higher-order structures.” We begin with toy examples with known topologies (spheres, toroids, planes, and knots), before turning to more complex, naturalistic data: fMRI signals collected from the human brain. We find that intrinsic, higher-order synergistic information is associated with three-dimensional cavities in an embedded point cloud: shapes such as spheres and hollow toroids are synergy-dominated, regardless of how the data is rotated. In fMRI data, we find strong correlations between synergistic information and both the number and size of three-dimensional cavities. Furthermore, we find that dimensionality reduction techniques such as PCA preferentially represent higher-order redundancies, and largely fail to preserve both higher-order information and topological structure, suggesting that common manifold-based approaches to studying high-dimensional data are systematically failing to identify important features of the data. These results point towards the possibility of developing a rich theory of higher-order interactions that spans topological and information-theoretic approaches while simultaneously highlighting the profound limitations of more conventional methods.

Neuroscience.title_cn: 协同性的拓扑学：联结拓扑学与信息论方法解析复杂系统中的高阶相互作用
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 不可约高阶相互作用的研究已成为复杂系统中的核心课题，因为它们为构建对涌现现象和涌现特性的定量理解提供了形式化框架。拓扑数据分析和多元信息论是其中两个发展最为完善的框架，它们旨在为识别经验数据中的高阶相互作用提供形式化工具。然而，尽管目标相似，这两种方法却建立在截然不同的数学基础之上，且在很大程度上是并行发展的，彼此间的跨学科交流有限。本研究对拓扑数据分析和信息论方法在描述多元数据中高阶相互作用方面的异同进行了直接比较，旨在评估这两种框架在定义“高阶结构”上的异同。我们首先使用已知拓扑结构（如球体、环面、平面和结）的玩具示例进行分析，随后转向更复杂的真实数据：从人脑中采集的功能性磁共振成像（fMRI）信号。我们发现，内在的高阶协同信息与嵌入点云中的三维空腔相关联：球体和中空环面等形状主要由协同作用主导，无论数据如何旋转。在fMRI数据中，我们发现协同信息与三维空腔的数量和大小之间存在强相关性。此外，我们发现主成分分析（PCA）等降维技术优先表示高阶冗余，并且在很大程度上未能保留高阶信息和拓扑结构，这表明研究高维数据的常见基于流形的方法系统性地未能识别数据的重要特征。这些结果表明，有可能发展出一种涵盖拓扑学和信息论方法的丰富的高阶相互作用理论，同时突显了传统方法的深远局限性。

Cancer.title: Uridine-sensitized screening identifies demethoxy-coenzyme Q and NUDT5 as regulators of nucleotide synthesis
Cancer.summary: Nature Metabolism, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s42255-025-01419-2A uridine-sensitized CRISPR-Cas9 screening identifies demethoxy-CoQ as an alternative electron acceptor in the absence of CoQ, and NUDT5 as a regulator of de novo pyrimidine synthesis via its interaction with PPAT.
Cancer.abstract: Rapidly proliferating cells require large amounts of nucleotides, making nucleotide metabolism a widely exploited therapeutic target against cancer, autoinflammatory disorders and viral infections. However, regulation of nucleotide metabolism remains incompletely understood. Here, we reveal regulators of de novo pyrimidine synthesis. Using uridine-sensitized CRISPR-Cas9 screening, we show that coenzyme Q (CoQ) is dispensable for pyrimidine synthesis, in the presence of the demethoxy-CoQ intermediate as alternative electron acceptor. We further report that the ADP-ribose pyrophosphatase NUDT5 directly binds PPAT, the rate-limiting enzyme in purine synthesis, which inhibits its activity and preserves the phosphoribosyl pyrophosphate (PRPP) pool. In the absence of NUDT5, hyperactive purine synthesis exhausts the PRPP pool at the expense of pyrimidine synthesis, which promotes resistance to purine and pyrimidine nucleobase analogues. Of note, the interaction between NUDT5 and PPAT is disrupted by PRPP, highlighting an intricate allosteric regulation. Overall, our findings reveal a fundamental mechanism of nucleotide balance and position NUDT5 as a regulator of nucleobase analogue metabolism. A uridine-sensitized CRISPR-Cas9 screening identifies demethoxy-CoQ as an alternative electron acceptor in the absence of CoQ, and NUDT5 as a regulator of de novo pyrimidine synthesis via its interaction with PPAT.
